original: @1b #// rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b #// rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i dzny'a na ti la ka yo gi n'i tantra r'a dza pa ra ma ma h'a aad bhu tam na ma /
analyzed: shr'i dzny'a na ti la ka yo gi n'i tantra r'a dza pa ra ma ma h'a aad bhu tam na ma /
translated: Śrī-jñānatilaka-yoginī-tantra-rāja-paramā-mahād-bhuta-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The glorious great king of tantras of yoginīs, the ultimate marvel, the drop of wisdom

original: dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba; dpal ye shes thig le la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽'di skad bdag @2a *//
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba; dpal ye shes thig le la phyag 'tshal lo // 'di skad bdag @2a *//
translated: Homage to the glorious drop of wisdom.

original: gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard. At one time,

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas rnam par bskor nas rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas rnam par bskor nas rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs so //
translated: the Blessed One, the essence of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas, the great hero, surrounded by the powerful heroines, was dwelling in the bhaga of the vajra queen.

original: der dpal nam mkha' dri med dang / shin tu stobs chen po dang / lha'i dbang phyug dang / gsang ba'i bdag po dang / 'od drag dang / nyi dgra dang / @2b mchog dga' dang / thams cad kyi byed pa po dang / autpa la'i snying po dang /
analyzed: der dpal nam mkha' dri med dang / shin tu stobs chen po dang / lha'i dbang phyug dang / gsang ba'i bdag po dang / 'od drag dang / nyi dgra dang / @2b mchog dga' dang / thams cad kyi byed pa po dang / autpa la'i snying po dang /
translated: There were also Śrī Vimalagātra, Mahābala, Śiva, Guhyapati, Ugraprabha, Sūryārī, Varāṅga, Sarvakarman, Utpala-garbha,

original: zhi ba chen po'i bdag po dang / nag po 'dul ba dang / rmad du byung ba'i dpa' bo dang / dregs chen dang / nag po chen po dregs 'joms dang / ri rab brtan pa dang / nam mkha'i zhal lo //
analyzed: zhi ba chen po'i bdag po dang / nag po 'dul ba dang / rmad du byung ba'i dpa' bo dang / dregs chen dang / nag po chen po dregs 'joms dang / ri rab brtan pa dang / nam mkha'i zhal lo //
translated: Maheśvara, Śāntarūpa, Vināyaka, Aśokavajra, Mahābhairava, Mahākāla, and Meru-sthira.

original: yang dpa' mo'i dbang mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams la 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang dpa' mo'i dbang mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams la 'di lta ste /
translated: There were also the powerful goddesses, such as:

original: zla ba mo dang / g-yon pa ma dang / mi mnyam ma dang / rlung za ba ma dang / bsil sbyin ma dang / snying po'i 'dab ma dang / bag yod thor cog ma dang / nyi ma 'dul ma dang / zhi ba 'chi ba'i pho nya ma dang /
analyzed: zla ba mo dang / g-yon pa ma dang / mi mnyam ma dang / rlung za ba ma dang / bsil sbyin ma dang / snying po'i 'dab ma dang / bag yod thor cog ma dang / nyi ma 'dul ma dang / zhi ba 'chi ba'i pho nya ma dang /
translated: Candra, Vāma, Viṣamā, Vāyu-bhakṣā, Śītalā, Hṛdaya-patrā, Apramāda-śikhā, Sūrya-damanī, Śānti-mṛtyu-dūtī,

original: ljang brtson ma dang / 'od 'dun ma dang / tshangs pa ma dang / khyab 'jug ma @3a *//
analyzed: ljang brtson ma dang / 'od 'dun ma dang / tshangs pa ma dang / khyab 'jug ma @3a *//
translated: Green Effort, Light Desire, Brahma, Vishnu,

original: dang / thog kha ma dang / thams cad skyed ma dang / dpa' bo'i yum mo //
analyzed: dang / thog kha ma dang / thams cad skyed ma dang / dpa' bo'i yum mo //
translated: Sky, All-Producing, and Heroine.

original: yang ma mo'i btsun mo rnams la 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang ma mo'i btsun mo rnams la 'di lta ste /
translated: The queens of the Mothers are as follows:

original: skam ma dang / 'jigs ma dang / 'od ma dang / mchu 'phyang ma dang / ri rab so ma dang / dus kyi bde byed ma dang / nyi mig ma dang / me zhal ma dang / 'dod pa ma dang / lce ring ma dang /
analyzed: skam ma dang / 'jigs ma dang / 'od ma dang / mchu 'phyang ma dang / ri rab so ma dang / dus kyi bde byed ma dang / nyi mig ma dang / me zhal ma dang / 'dod pa ma dang / lce ring ma dang /
translated: Dry, Fearful, Light, Hanging Lip, Mountain Tooth, Time's Delight, Sun-Eye, Fire-Face, Desire, Long Tongue,

original: chos dga' ma dang / 'dod bden ma dang / mig stong ma dang / stag ma dang / gtum mo dang / 'dod gzugs ma'o //
analyzed: chos dga' ma dang / 'dod bden ma dang / mig stong ma dang / stag ma dang / gtum mo dang / 'dod gzugs ma'o //
translated: Dharma Joy, Truth of Desire, Thousand Eyes, Tigress, Fierce, and Desire-Form.

original: de lta bu'i rab zhal la sogs pa dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma dang / ma mo'i btsun mo bya ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kyi 'khor gyi dbus su legs dgyes @3b chen po'i sbyor ba la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rab zhal la sogs pa dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma dang / ma mo'i btsun mo bya ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kyi 'khor gyi dbus su legs dgyes @3b chen po'i sbyor ba la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te /
translated: In the center of a retinue of seventy-two heroes and heroines, such as the one facing forward, and the powerful heroines and the queens of the mamos, the Bhagavān, abiding in union with the great Hevajra, addressed the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maheśvara.

original: kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug /
analyzed: kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug /
translated: “O bodhisattva mahāsattva Maheśvara,

original: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' dang / de la rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad dag dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig /
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' dang / de la rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad dag dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig /
translated: listen to the essence of the three realities, the supreme bliss of the moon, the limit of the great seal, and there, the essence, the aspect, and the measure, which are renowned in the Śrījñānatilaka.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug 'khor thams cad dang lhan cig tu lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te sa la lta zhing cang mi smra bar 'dug go /🔽de'i tshe nam mkha' la me tog mand'a ra ba dang / mand'a ra ba chen po dang / autpa la dang / nyi ma'i 'od mnyam dang / chu skyes dang / punda r'i ka dang / aa sho ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / aardzu na dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug 'khor thams cad dang lhan cig tu lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te sa la lta zhing cang mi smra bar 'dug go / de'i tshe nam mkha' la me tog mand'a ra ba dang / mand'a ra ba chen po dang / autpa la dang / nyi ma'i 'od mnyam dang / chu skyes dang / punda r'i ka dang / aa sho ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / aardzu na dang /
translated: When the Bhagavān had spoken thus, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maheśvara, together with his entire retinue, circumambulated the Bhagavān three times and, bowing his head at the Bhagavān’s feet, remained silent, looking at the ground.

original: n'a ga ge sar la sogs pa dri zhim pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rin po che'i char du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du babs so //
analyzed: n'a ga ge sar la sogs pa dri zhim pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rin po che'i char du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du babs so //
translated: At that time, various kinds of fragrant flowers such as mandārava, great mandārava, utpala, equal sunlight, water-born, puṇḍarīka, aśoka, campaka, aśoka, and nāga-kesara fell as a rain of jewels at the Bhagavān’s feet.

original: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te /
analyzed: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te /
translated: Again, the Lord addressed the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maheśvara:

original: khyod ci zhig la ya mtshan @4a *//
analyzed: khyod ci zhig la ya mtshan @4a *//
translated: “What do you wonder about?”

original: du gyur / lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
analyzed: du gyur / lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
translated: Maheśvara said:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Bhagavān,

original: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' dang / de la rang gi ngo bo dang / tshad dang / rnam pa yod dam ci lags zhes bdag ya mtshan du gyur lags so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' dang / de la rang gi ngo bo dang / tshad dang / rnam pa yod dam ci lags zhes bdag ya mtshan du gyur lags so //
translated: I wonder whether the essence, aspect, and measure exist in the three natures, the supreme bliss of the moon, and the limit of the great seal.”

original: dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang phyug la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang phyug la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The supreme vajra holder said this to the great hero Maheśvara:

original: ae ma ho de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la de'i rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad med dam ci /
analyzed: ae ma ho de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la de'i rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad med dam ci /
translated: “Amazing! The essence, aspect, and measure of the three natures, the supreme bliss of the moon, and the limit of the great seal do not exist.”

original: de ltar ma yin na /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na /
translated: If it is not like that,

original: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo stong pa nyid 'di ga la shes /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo stong pa nyid 'di ga la shes /
translated: How can one know this emptiness, the essence of all phenomena?

original: mig yor tsam gyi rgyu'i rten ni /
analyzed: mig yor tsam gyi rgyu'i rten ni /
translated: The basis of the cause of the mere reflection

original: chos thams cad do //
analyzed: chos thams cad do //
translated: is all phenomena.

original: de ltar gla rtsi la brten nas dri 'byung ba gla rtsi'i dngos po med na /
analyzed: de ltar gla rtsi la brten nas dri 'byung ba gla rtsi'i dngos po med na /
translated: Thus, if the scent does not exist in the substance of the musk,

original: dri ji ltar rnyed par 'gyur /
analyzed: dri ji ltar rnyed par 'gyur /
translated: how can one obtain the scent in dependence on musk?

original: de bzhin du rang gi ngo bo dang / chos kyi tshad dang / rnam pa dag med par gyur na /
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi ngo bo dang / chos kyi tshad dang / rnam pa dag med par gyur na /
translated: In the same way, if the intrinsic essence, the measure of phenomena, and the aspects do not exist,

original: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i sku'i rnyed pa med do //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i sku'i rnyed pa med do //
translated: then the attainment of the body of the great seal, the supreme bliss of the moon, the nature of the three realities, does not exist.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: khyab dang khyab byed bye brag tu //
analyzed: khyab dang khyab byed bye brag tu //
translated: the pervader and the pervaded are distinct.

original: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba che //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba che //
translated: The great bliss of nonduality

original: bde ba sku la brnyen pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bde ba sku la brnyen pa'i phyir //
translated: is the attainment of the body of bliss.

original: bde la brten na de nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: bde la brten na de nyid 'gyur //
translated: If one relies on bliss, it becomes reality.

original: bde sku rnam par shes yin na //
analyzed: bde sku rnam par shes yin na //
translated: If the body of bliss is consciousness,

original: @4b thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dngos //
analyzed: @4b thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dngos //
translated: all things are the nondual reality.

original: drug gi bde ba ye shes mchog /
analyzed: drug gi bde ba ye shes mchog /
translated: The bliss of the six is the supreme intuition.

original: bde dang sku ni gnyis las 'byung //
analyzed: bde dang sku ni gnyis las 'byung //
translated: Bliss and the body arise from the two.

original: 'khor lo drug gi dbus na bzhugs //
analyzed: 'khor lo drug gi dbus na bzhugs //
translated: Resides in the middle of the six cakras.

original: de nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid mchog /
analyzed: de nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid mchog /
translated: The supreme nature of the three realities

original: zla ba la sogs 'bral bdag nyid //
analyzed: zla ba la sogs 'bral bdag nyid //
translated: Is the nature free from the moon and so forth.

original: de nyid gsum bdag rgyu ru grags //
analyzed: de nyid gsum bdag rgyu ru grags //
translated: The nature of the three realities is renowned as the cause.

original: lus rten srog gi dbyug pa la //
analyzed: lus rten srog gi dbyug pa la //
translated: In the body support, the staff of life,

original: sbyor ba drug gi ye shes bzhugs //
analyzed: sbyor ba drug gi ye shes bzhugs //
translated: The wisdom of the six unions resides.

original: 'khor lo drug gi lte ba'i dbus //
analyzed: 'khor lo drug gi lte ba'i dbus //
translated: In the middle of the center of the six cakras,

original: phra mo'i lus ldan rtsa ni drug /
analyzed: phra mo'i lus ldan rtsa ni drug /
translated: There are six nāḍīs with subtle bodies.

original: thig le dang bcas de rnams sbyor //
analyzed: thig le dang bcas de rnams sbyor //
translated: They are united with the bindu

original: srog gi dbyug pa'i nang du'o //
analyzed: srog gi dbyug pa'i nang du'o //
translated: In the inner staff of life.

original: bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba yi //
analyzed: bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba yi //
translated: In the center of the cakra of great bliss,🔽The moon is endowed with life;

original: zla mo tshe dang ldan pa ste; ;de ni srog dbyug rtsa ba yin //
analyzed: zla mo tshe dang ldan pa ste; ;de ni srog dbyug rtsa ba yin //
translated: That is the root of the staff of life.

original: zur gsum gyi ni rnam pa'i tshul //
analyzed: zur gsum gyi ni rnam pa'i tshul //
translated: It is in the aspect of a triangle.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lte ba yi //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lte ba yi //
translated: In the center of the saṃbhogacakra,

original: lce ma bde ba ldan pa ni //
analyzed: lce ma bde ba ldan pa ni //
translated: The tongue is endowed with bliss;

original: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i ske //
analyzed: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i ske //
translated: That is the neck of the staff of life.

original: rigs kyi me tog dang 'dra ba //
analyzed: rigs kyi me tog dang 'dra ba //
translated: It is like the flower of the family.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba la //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba la //
translated: In the center of the dharmacakra,

original: nam mkha' ma ni ye shes ldan //
analyzed: nam mkha' ma ni ye shes ldan //
translated: The sky is endowed with wisdom;

original: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i snying //
analyzed: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i snying //
translated: That is the heart of the staff of life.

original: ba yi mig gi rnam pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: ba yi mig gi rnam pa'i gzugs //
translated: The form of the eye of a cow.

original: lte ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i nang //
analyzed: lte ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i nang //
translated: In the center of the emanation cakra of the navel,

original: 'od ma dang ni dus ldan ma //
analyzed: 'od ma dang ni dus ldan ma //
translated: Kāśyapī is with Kālarātri.

original: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i lte //
analyzed: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i lte //
translated: That is the knot of the staff of life.

original: padma rgyas pa'i rnam pa bzhin //
analyzed: padma rgyas pa'i rnam pa bzhin //
translated: It is like the form of an open lotus.

original: me yi 'khor lo'i snying ga yi //
analyzed: me yi 'khor lo'i snying ga yi //
translated: The fire cakra is in the heart.

original: 'dod pa dang ldan rab 'od ma //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang ldan rab 'od ma //
translated: Ratipriyā is with Prabhāvatī.

original: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i 'doms //
analyzed: de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i 'doms //
translated: That is the knot of the staff of life.

original: rdo rje'i rnam pa bzhin du gsal //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rnam pa bzhin du gsal //
translated: It is clear, like the form of a vajra.

original: rlung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba la //
analyzed: rlung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba la //
translated: In the center of the air cakra,

original: stobs ni brtson 'grus ma dang ldan //
analyzed: stobs ni brtson 'grus ma dang ldan //
translated: Balā is with Vīryavatī.

original: srog gi @5a *//
analyzed: srog gi @5a *//
translated: The staff of life

original: dbyug pa de yi mtha'//
analyzed: dbyug pa de yi mtha'//
translated: is at the end of that.

original: til gyi me tog rgyas pa bzhin //
analyzed: til gyi me tog rgyas pa bzhin //
translated: It is like a fully opened sesame flower.

original: de ni sbyor drug gi rnam shes //
analyzed: de ni sbyor drug gi rnam shes //
translated: That is the consciousness of the six unions.

original: rtsa dang thig le dang ldan no //
analyzed: rtsa dang thig le dang ldan no //
translated: It is endowed with nāḍīs and bindus.

original: rtog med mas ni 'khyud yin phyir //
analyzed: rtog med mas ni 'khyud yin phyir //
translated: Since it is embraced by Akṛtā,

original: de tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa yin //
analyzed: de tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa yin //
translated: at that time it is the staff of Brahmā.

original: de yi dus ni bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: de yi dus ni bdag gis bshad //
translated: I will explain its time.

original: shar dang nub pa rnam gnyis so //
analyzed: shar dang nub pa rnam gnyis so //
translated: There are two: the east and the west.

original: gang gi tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa la mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa la mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod de /
translated: The staff of Brahma has thirty-two knots.

original: de la lte ba'i 'og tu 'pho ba bcu drug /
analyzed: de la lte ba'i 'og tu 'pho ba bcu drug /
translated: Below the navel there are sixteen movements.

original: steng du 'pho ba bcu drug /
analyzed: steng du 'pho ba bcu drug /
translated: Above there are sixteen movements.

original: byang chub kyi sems dang rlung gnyis phrad pa'i phyir 'pho ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dang rlung gnyis phrad pa'i phyir 'pho ba ste /
translated: Because the bodhicitta and the wind meet, there is movement.

original: steng 'og gcig pu'i dngos po sbyor ba'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: steng 'og gcig pu'i dngos po sbyor ba'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: The staff of Brahma is the thirty-two nāḍīs that unite the upper and lower [winds].

original: byang chub kyi sems dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gdu bu'i rnam pa sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo gcig pu'i rtog med bde legs yid mas tshangs pa'i dbyug pa 'khyud nas bde ba chen po'i gtsug tor nas gsang ba bde ba chen po nor bu'i kha
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gdu bu'i rnam pa sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo gcig pu'i rtog med bde legs yid mas tshangs pa'i dbyug pa 'khyud nas bde ba chen po'i gtsug tor nas gsang ba bde ba chen po nor bu'i kha
translated: The bodhicitta, which is like a bracelet endowed with joy, the nature of the body, speech, and mind, the single nonconceptual bliss, embraces the staff of Brahma, and the great bliss of the secret great-bliss gem at the crown

original: rlung gi 'khor lo yan chad /
analyzed: rlung gi 'khor lo yan chad /
translated: up to the wheel of the wind.

original: ji ltar tsandan go sh'irsha'i shing la sbrul chen po yod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ji ltar tsandan go sh'irsha'i shing la sbrul chen po yod pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like a great snake on a sandalwood tree.

original: lha'i dbang phyug /
analyzed: lha'i dbang phyug /
translated: O Lord of the Gods,

original: de la ji ltar rang gi ngo bo bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la ji ltar rang gi ngo bo bshad par bya ste /
translated: now I will explain its nature.

original: tshangs pa'i rus pa'i dbyug pa'i snying po'i dang po zur gsum gyi rnam pa mdud pa lte ba'i srog gi rlung dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'od kyi thig le shes rab ma'i lte bas zla ba yar ngo'i tshes dang po'i chu tshod gcig gi bar du
analyzed: tshangs pa'i rus pa'i dbyug pa'i snying po'i dang po zur gsum gyi rnam pa mdud pa lte ba'i srog gi rlung dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'od kyi thig le shes rab ma'i lte bas zla ba yar ngo'i tshes dang po'i chu tshod gcig gi bar du
translated: The essence of the staff of Brahma's bone, in the form of a triple-pointed knot, is endowed with the life-force wind at the navel. The bindu of light of bodhicitta, from the navel of the wisdom consort, is the waxing moon, for one hour of the first lunar day.

original: 'dod @5b pa'i dga' bshar ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod @5b pa'i dga' bshar ba'o //
translated: This is the drinking of the joy of desire.

original: padma'i 'bras bu'i 'dod pa las 'dar ba'i nye ba dang ldan pa tshes gnyis kyi bar du stobs nub pa'o //
analyzed: padma'i 'bras bu'i 'dod pa las 'dar ba'i nye ba dang ldan pa tshes gnyis kyi bar du stobs nub pa'o //
translated: From the desire of the lotus fruit, endowed with trembling, for two lunar days, the strength declines.

original: drag po'i mig gi 'dus pa las 'gro ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa tshes gsum gyi chu tshod gsum gyi bar du sprin gyi thig le shar ba'i dus su'o //
analyzed: drag po'i mig gi 'dus pa las 'gro ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa tshes gsum gyi chu tshod gsum gyi bar du sprin gyi thig le shar ba'i dus su'o //
translated: From the union of Shiva's eye, endowed with equality, for three hours of the third lunar day, at the time of the rising of the bindu of the cloud.

original: rigs kyi bu me tog gi nu ma reg pa las dga' ba gyen du 'gro ba dang ldan pa'i tshes bzhi'i chu tshod bzhi'i bar du nub pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu me tog gi nu ma reg pa las dga' ba gyen du 'gro ba dang ldan pa'i tshes bzhi'i chu tshod bzhi'i bar du nub pa'o //
translated: Son of good family, from the touch of the flower bud, endowed with the upward movement of joy, for four hours of the fourth lunar day, the decline.

original: tshangs pa'i mig ma mchu'i bdud rtsi btung ba sbyin pa las rgyas pa thur du byung ba dang ldan pa tshes lnga'i chu tshod lnga'i bar dbugs shar ba'i dus so //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i mig ma mchu'i bdud rtsi btung ba sbyin pa las rgyas pa thur du byung ba dang ldan pa tshes lnga'i chu tshod lnga'i bar dbugs shar ba'i dus so //
translated: The eye of Brahmā, endowed with the expansion that comes from drinking the nectar of the lower lip, is the time of the arising of the breath up to the fifth period of the fifth lunar day.

original: dung gi mig gis sen mo btab pa las drag po 'jigs pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'i tshes drug gi chu tshod drug gi bar du autpa la'i nub pa'i dus so //
analyzed: dung gi mig gis sen mo btab pa las drag po 'jigs pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'i tshes drug gi chu tshod drug gi bar du autpa la'i nub pa'i dus so //
translated: The eye of the conch, endowed with the manner of the fierce one that comes from pressing the nail, is the time of the setting of the utpala up to the sixth period of the sixth lunar day.

original: rna ba'i mig gi sbyor ba las byung ba'i khyab byed dang ldan pa'i tshes bdun gyi chu tshod bdun gyi bar du mgo ka la shar ba'i dus so //
analyzed: rna ba'i mig gi sbyor ba las byung ba'i khyab byed dang ldan pa'i tshes bdun gyi chu tshod bdun gyi bar du mgo ka la shar ba'i dus so //
translated: The eye of the ear, endowed with the pervading that comes from union, is the time of the rising of the head up to the seventh period of the seventh lunar day.

original: ba'i mig gis 'bras bu'i bskyod pa las mchog gi dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa tshes brgyad kyi chu tshod brgyad kyi bar du yid nub pa'i dus so //
analyzed: ba'i mig gis 'bras bu'i bskyod pa las mchog gi dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa tshes brgyad kyi chu tshod brgyad kyi bar du yid nub pa'i dus so //
translated: The eye of the anus, endowed with the four supreme joys that comes from the shaking of the fruit, is the time of the setting of the mind up to the eighth period of the eighth lunar day.

original: dung gi lte ba'i nu ma dam por 'khyud pa las 'bar ba lhod pa dang ldan pa'i tshes dgu'i chu tshod dgu'i bar du snying po shar ba'i dus so //
analyzed: dung gi lte ba'i nu ma dam por 'khyud pa las 'bar ba lhod pa dang ldan pa'i tshes dgu'i chu tshod dgu'i bar du snying po shar ba'i dus so //
translated: From the tight embrace of the nipple in the center of the conch, the blazing is relaxed, and the essence arises for nine hours of the ninth day.

original: glang po che'i lte ba'i ske'i  sgra las thig le mtha' dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu'i chu tshod bcu'i bar du zla ba nub @6a *//🔽pa'i dus so //
analyzed: glang po che'i lte ba'i ske'i  sgra las thig le mtha' dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu'i chu tshod bcu'i bar du zla ba nub @6a *// pa'i dus so //
translated: From the sound of the throat in the center of the elephant, the bindu is endowed with an end, and the moon sets for ten hours of the tenth day.

original: autpa la'i lte ba'i mig gi 'o las myos pa khrung khrung dang ldan ba'i tshes bcu gcig gi chu tshod bcu gcig bar du nyi ma shar ba'i dus so //
analyzed: autpa la'i lte ba'i mig gi 'o las myos pa khrung khrung dang ldan ba'i tshes bcu gcig gi chu tshod bcu gcig bar du nyi ma shar ba'i dus so //
translated: From the kiss of the eyes in the center of the lotus, the intoxicated crane is endowed, and the sun rises for eleven hours of the eleventh day.

original: padma'i lte ba'i sbrug cing bsigs pa las dga' bral gyi dga' ba kro dha dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi bar du drag po nub pa'i dus so //
analyzed: padma'i lte ba'i sbrug cing bsigs pa las dga' bral gyi dga' ba kro dha dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi bar du drag po nub pa'i dus so //
translated: From the shaking and trembling in the center of the lotus, the joy of freedom from joy is endowed with krodha, and Rudra sets for twelve hours of the twelfth day.

original: bud ba'i kha'i grong khyer las aud mi rem pa dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu gsum gyi chu tshod bcu gsum gyi bar du mchog gi shar ba'i dus so //
analyzed: bud ba'i kha'i grong khyer las aud mi rem pa dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu gsum gyi chu tshod bcu gsum gyi bar du mchog gi shar ba'i dus so //
translated: From the city of the mouth of the mare, the supreme one rises for thirteen hours of the thirteenth day.

original: rma bya'i kha'i bskum pa las tshul 'byed pa dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du sgra nub pa'i dus so //
analyzed: rma bya'i kha'i bskum pa las tshul 'byed pa dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du sgra nub pa'i dus so //
translated: From the contraction of the peacock's beak, there is the time of the setting of the sound, up to the fourteenth of the lunar fortnight, which is endowed with the separation of the modes.

original: rdo rje'i kha ru mnyam par sbyor ba las gnyid 'on pa dang ldan pa'i nya'i chu tshod bco lnga'i bar du ro'i shar ba'i dus so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i kha ru mnyam par sbyor ba las gnyid 'on pa dang ldan pa'i nya'i chu tshod bco lnga'i bar du ro'i shar ba'i dus so //
translated: From the union in the vajra's mouth, there is the time of the rising of the flavor, up to the fifteenth of the lunar fortnight, which is endowed with sleep.

original: rnam par rgyas pa'i til gyi me tog ha brjod pa las tshes bcu drug gi chu tshod bcu drug gi bar du lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gsal ba dang ldan pa'i thog gi nub pa'i dus so //
analyzed: rnam par rgyas pa'i til gyi me tog ha brjod pa las tshes bcu drug gi chu tshod bcu drug gi bar du lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gsal ba dang ldan pa'i thog gi nub pa'i dus so //
translated: From the utterance of the sesame flower of the expanded state, there is the time of the setting of the lightning, up to the sixteenth of the lunar fortnight, which is endowed with the clarity of the connate joy.

original: thog ni sngags 'jigs byed pa ste //
analyzed: thog ni sngags 'jigs byed pa ste //
translated: The lightning is the mantra Bhairava.

original: de la nub pa bcu drug yin //
analyzed: de la nub pa bcu drug yin //
translated: There are sixteen settings of that.

original: shar dang nub pa gang la lar //
analyzed: shar dang nub pa gang la lar //
translated: In whatever direction the lightning sets,

original: lhan cig skyes la de yod min //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes la de yod min //
translated: that is not the place of the connate.

original: yon po'i gdu bu'i rnam par 'byed //
analyzed: yon po'i gdu bu'i rnam par 'byed //
translated: The separation of the crooked bracelet🔽is the arising of the bindu in the center of the nāḍī,🔽the arising of joy, and so on,

original: rtsa yi lte dbus thig le dang // dga' ba la sogs shar ba dang // de ni nub pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: rtsa yi lte dbus thig le dang // dga' ba la sogs shar ba dang // de ni nub pa'i dus su'o //
translated: and the time of its setting.

original: de ltar bde chen @6b rnam pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar bde chen @6b rnam pa ni //
translated: Thus, the aspect of great bliss

original: 'pho ba ru ni bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: 'pho ba ru ni bdag gis bshad //
translated: I will explain the transference.

original: dngos dang rten dang rnam par 'byed //
analyzed: dngos dang rten dang rnam par 'byed //
translated: The real, the support, and the classification,

original: ye shes dga' bral lhan rtag bzhugs //
analyzed: ye shes dga' bral lhan rtag bzhugs //
translated: the wisdom, the separation from joy, the innate, and the constant abiding,

original: dngos po ro mnyam lta ba yin //🔽'dod pa chags pa'i rnam dag byed //
analyzed: dngos po ro mnyam lta ba yin // 'dod pa chags pa'i rnam dag byed //
translated: the real, the equality of taste, and the view,🔽the desire, the purification of passion,

original: 'dus pa reg bya byed pa yi //
analyzed: 'dus pa reg bya byed pa yi //
translated: the assembly, the tactile sensation, the action,

original: dngos ni srid pa med par byed //
analyzed: dngos ni srid pa med par byed //
translated: the real, the nonexistence of existence,

original: 'o dang 'khyud pa'i longs spyod rnams //
analyzed: 'o dang 'khyud pa'i longs spyod rnams //
translated: the enjoyment of kissing and embracing,

original: dngos ni dngos por rab gcod byed //
analyzed: dngos ni dngos por rab gcod byed //
translated: the real, the definite discrimination of the entity,

original: punda r'i ka'i 'byung sa yi //
analyzed: punda r'i ka'i 'byung sa yi //
translated: the source of the puṇḍarīka,

original: zur gsum la sogs brten pa yis //
analyzed: zur gsum la sogs brten pa yis //
translated: the support of the three corners, and so on,

original: rten ni bsam du med pa ste //
analyzed: rten ni bsam du med pa ste //
translated: the support is the inconceivable,

original: chos dbyings rang gi ngo bo yin //
analyzed: chos dbyings rang gi ngo bo yin //
translated: the essence of the dharmadhātu,

original: steng dang 'og ni mnyam pa'i rten //
analyzed: steng dang 'og ni mnyam pa'i rten //
translated: the support of the equal upper and lower,

original: mya ngan 'das pa rtog med byed //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa rtog med byed //
translated: the nonconceptual nirvāṇa,

original: bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rten //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rten //
translated: the support of the amṛta of great bliss,

original: rigs lnga yi ni mchog gi gzhi //
analyzed: rigs lnga yi ni mchog gi gzhi //
translated: the supreme basis of the five families,

original: ye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: ye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub //
translated: the spontaneous presence of the desired wisdom,

original: 'dar ba dga' ba mchog gi dga'//
analyzed: 'dar ba dga' ba mchog gi dga'//
translated: the supreme joy of trembling joy,

original: ye shes shes pa lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: ye shes shes pa lhun gyis grub //
translated: the spontaneous presence of the knowledge of wisdom,🔽and the supreme joy of the supreme joy.

original: gzhi med pa yi lhan cig skyes //
analyzed: gzhi med pa yi lhan cig skyes //
translated: The connate [joy] is without a basis.

original: gzhi dang bcas pa dga' bral dga'//
analyzed: gzhi dang bcas pa dga' bral dga'//
translated: The joy of separation from joy has a basis.

original: ye shes nga rgyal med par byed //
analyzed: ye shes nga rgyal med par byed //
translated: Wisdom is made free of pride.

original: chos kun rnam par shes pa ste //
analyzed: chos kun rnam par shes pa ste //
translated: All phenomena are consciousness.

original: ye shes shes bya don grub byed //🔽rnam par 'byed pa 'od gzugs grags //
analyzed: ye shes shes bya don grub byed // rnam par 'byed pa 'od gzugs grags //
translated: Wisdom accomplishes the goal of objects of knowledge.🔽Discernment is the light, the form, and fame.

original: tshul dang sprin dang stobs bdag nyid //
analyzed: tshul dang sprin dang stobs bdag nyid //
translated: The method, the cloud, and the lord of power

original: rnam par 'byed pa dngos kun du //🔽rnam pa'i gzhi dang bcas pa thim; ;skye dang gnas pa sgyu 'phrul gyi //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa dngos kun du // rnam pa'i gzhi dang bcas pa thim; ;skye dang gnas pa sgyu 'phrul gyi //
translated: are the discernment of all entities.🔽The basis of the aspect dissolves.🔽Discernment kills the ignorance🔽of birth, abiding, and the magical

original: rnam par 'byed pa gti mug gsod //🔽'khor lo sngags dang bya ba la //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa gti mug gsod // 'khor lo sngags dang bya ba la //
translated: display.🔽That which conquers the wheel, mantra, and action

original: 'joms byed de ni rnam par 'byed //🔽rtsa yi snying po @7a *//
analyzed: 'joms byed de ni rnam par 'byed // rtsa yi snying po @7a *//
translated: is the discernment.

original: thams cad ni //
analyzed: thams cad ni //
translated: All the essences of the nāḍīs

original: bcom pa'i phyir ni rnam par 'byed //
analyzed: bcom pa'i phyir ni rnam par 'byed //
translated: are discerned in order to be conquered.

original: ye shes kyi ni snying po'i mtha'//
analyzed: ye shes kyi ni snying po'i mtha'//
translated: The end of the essence of wisdom

original: rnam par 'byed pa gsol ba yin //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa gsol ba yin //
translated: is the supplication of discernment.

original: ye shes shin tu bde byed phyir //
analyzed: ye shes shin tu bde byed phyir //
translated: Because wisdom creates great bliss,

original: rnam par 'byed par de phyir brjod //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed par de phyir brjod //
translated: it is called discernment.

original: gnyis su med pa mchog zhi ba //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa mchog zhi ba //
translated: The supreme peace of nonduality🔽is the discernment of the great summit.

original: chags pa dang ni chags bral min //
analyzed: chags pa dang ni chags bral min //
translated: Neither attached nor detached,

original: dri ma med pa bcos med pa //
analyzed: dri ma med pa bcos med pa //
translated: Stainless, unfabricated,

original: rgyud dang sngags dang rim pa bral //
analyzed: rgyud dang sngags dang rim pa bral //
translated: Free from tantra, mantra, and stages,

original: rang rigs pa dang brjod du med //
analyzed: rang rigs pa dang brjod du med //
translated: Self-existent, inexpressible,

original: thams cad khyab cing dpe byad med //
analyzed: thams cad khyab cing dpe byad med //
translated: Pervading everything, without distinguishing marks.

original: de lta bu ni don dam pa //
analyzed: de lta bu ni don dam pa //
translated: Such is the ultimate,

original: lha yi dbang phyug rnam par 'byed //
analyzed: lha yi dbang phyug rnam par 'byed //
translated: Discriminated by the lord of gods.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyi //
translated: In the hearts of all buddhas and bodhisattvas,

original: thugs kar rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: thugs kar rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
translated: It always abides.

original: rnam par 'byed la sgom pa med //🔽phung po khams la sogs dang bral //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed la sgom pa med // phung po khams la sogs dang bral //
translated: In discrimination, there is no meditation,🔽Free from the aggregates, elements, and so forth,

original: sgra la sogs pa'i chos kyis stong //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa'i chos kyis stong //
translated: Empty of phenomena such as sound,

original: stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid yin //
analyzed: stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid yin //
translated: The nature of emptiness and compassion.🔽Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva,🔽Maheshvara, always peaceful,

original: tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang // dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba dang // de rnams kun gyi yab yin no //
analyzed: tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang // dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba dang // de rnams kun gyi yab yin no //
translated: The father of all of them.

original: 'byed pa dang ni mchog rmad 'byung //
analyzed: 'byed pa dang ni mchog rmad 'byung //
translated: The differentiator, the supreme wonder,

original: de nyid ye shes thig le 'dir //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes thig le 'dir //
translated: In this very wisdom drop,

original: mchog rnams grub pa'i mnga' bdag go /
analyzed: mchog rnams grub pa'i mnga' bdag go /
translated: The lord of the accomplishment of the supreme.

original: 'byung ba kun gyi nang yod pa //
analyzed: 'byung ba kun gyi nang yod pa //
translated: Existing within all elements,

original: sku lnga'i bdag yid rab mchog yin; ;mkha' 'gro dbang phyug lnga bdag po //
analyzed: sku lnga'i bdag yid rab mchog yin; ;mkha' 'gro dbang phyug lnga bdag po //
translated: The lord of the five powerful dakinis.

original: nam mkha' bdag nyid skye med do //
analyzed: nam mkha' bdag nyid skye med do //
translated: The nature of space is unborn.

original: nam mkha' lnga yi nang du thim //
analyzed: nam mkha' lnga yi nang du thim //
translated: It dissolves into the five spaces.🔽It is the wisdom of the great secret

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa //🔽de lta'i @7b gsang chen ye shes ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa // de lta'i @7b gsang chen ye shes ni //
translated: That is worshipped by all the buddhas.

original: ye shes dbang po rnyed dka' ba //🔽ji ltar nor ni rkun mo yis //
analyzed: ye shes dbang po rnyed dka' ba // ji ltar nor ni rkun mo yis //
translated: Such wisdom is difficult to attain.🔽Like a thief who does not find wealth,

original: ma rnyed byed ltar 'bad pas sba //
analyzed: ma rnyed byed ltar 'bad pas sba //
translated: It is hidden with effort.

original: dpal ye shes thig le las /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le las /
translated: From the glorious Wisdom-tittle:

original: 'pho ba'i dus shar ba dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
analyzed: 'pho ba'i dus shar ba dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
translated: The first chapter on the rising and setting of the time of transference.

original: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
analyzed: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
translated: The lord of gods said:

original: kye bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Oh Bhagavan!

original: de nyid gsum bdag nga ro ci //
analyzed: de nyid gsum bdag nga ro ci //
translated: What is the sound of the three realities?

original: de bzhin zla ba'i bde ba mchog /
analyzed: de bzhin zla ba'i bde ba mchog /
translated: Likewise, what is the supreme bliss of the moon?

original: phyag rgya chen po'i rnam pa ci //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i rnam pa ci //
translated: What is the form of the great seal?

original: de yi mtha' ni ji ltar lags //
analyzed: de yi mtha' ni ji ltar lags //
translated: What is its limit?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavan replied:🔽The three realities are the body, speech, and mind.

original: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs; ;rdo rje gsung ni ye shes mchog /
analyzed: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs; ;rdo rje gsung ni ye shes mchog /
translated: The vajra speech is the supreme wisdom.

original: zla ba'i bde ba mchog ces pa //
analyzed: zla ba'i bde ba mchog ces pa //
translated: The supreme bliss of the moon

original: de yi phung po dbang po khams //
analyzed: de yi phung po dbang po khams //
translated: is the aggregates, faculties, and elements.

original: phyag rgya chen po rdor snying po //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po rdor snying po //
translated: The great seal is the essence of the vajra.

original: de yi mtha' ni bha gar dran //
analyzed: de yi mtha' ni bha gar dran //
translated: Its end is remembered in the bhaga.

original: mtha' dang snang ba rnam par shes //
analyzed: mtha' dang snang ba rnam par shes //
translated: The end and appearance are consciousness.

original: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
analyzed: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
translated: It is seen like the moon in water.

original: chos kun rang bzhin dri ma med //
analyzed: chos kun rang bzhin dri ma med //
translated: All phenomena are naturally stainless.

original: snang ba las ni thams cad 'byung //
analyzed: snang ba las ni thams cad 'byung //
translated: Everything arises from appearance.

original: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med //
analyzed: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med //
translated: There is neither arising nor ceasing.

original: yang dag 'od las thams cad 'byung //
analyzed: yang dag 'od las thams cad 'byung //
translated: Everything arises from the light of reality.

original: de'i phyi rol chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni /
analyzed: de'i phyi rol chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni /
translated: Outside of that, the nature of all phenomena is

original: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o //
translated: the glorious Bhagavān Jñānatilaka.

original: de la dang po rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bskyed pa sgom pa dang / sngags dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod sbyin dang / gtor ma dang / mchod pa dang / @8a *//
analyzed: de la dang po rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bskyed pa sgom pa dang / sngags dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod sbyin dang / gtor ma dang / mchod pa dang / @8a *//
translated: There, first, the generation of the maṇḍala wheel with aspects, the meditation, the mantra, the repetition, the fire sacrifice, the sacrifice, the bali offering, the worship,

original: gnas kyi brjod pa dang / dbang bskur gyi rim pa de dag bshad do //
analyzed: gnas kyi brjod pa dang / dbang bskur gyi rim pa de dag bshad do //
translated: the description of the place, and the stages of empowerment are explained.

original: dpal ye shes thig le las /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le las /
translated: From the glorious Jñānatilaka Tantra,

original: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / zla ba mchog gi bde ba dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la sogs pa'i phyogs tsam bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / zla ba mchog gi bde ba dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la sogs pa'i phyogs tsam bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
translated: This is the second chapter, which is a brief explanation of the nature of the three realities, the bliss of the supreme moon, the limit of mahāmudrā, and so on.🔽The lord of gods said:

original: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa; tshangs pa'i rus pa srog gi dbyug pa'i steng dang 'og gi 'pho ba cha gnyis su rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin las le'u dang por gang gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa; tshangs pa'i rus pa srog gi dbyug pa'i steng dang 'og gi 'pho ba cha gnyis su rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin las le'u dang por gang gsungs pa ni /
translated: The thirty-two nāḍīs, which were explained in the first chapter, are the nature of the two parts of the movement above and below the shank of Brahma.

original: de rnams kyi nang nas gcig tu rtog med bde legs yid ma gcig pu nges par bstan par mdzad kyi /
analyzed: de rnams kyi nang nas gcig tu rtog med bde legs yid ma gcig pu nges par bstan par mdzad kyi /
translated: From among those, one of them, the one nāḍī of nonconceptual bliss, is definitely taught.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: rtsa gzhan rnams ci'i don phyir 'dir ma gsungs /
analyzed: rtsa gzhan rnams ci'i don phyir 'dir ma gsungs /
translated: why were the other nāḍīs not taught here?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The bhagavān replied:

original: gcig pu rtog med bde legs yid ma de ni /
analyzed: gcig pu rtog med bde legs yid ma de ni /
translated: The one nāḍī of nonconceptual bliss

original: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi phra mo'i dra ba rnams rol mo'i don du byas nas sna tshogs kyi bdud rtsi bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
analyzed: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi phra mo'i dra ba rnams rol mo'i don du byas nas sna tshogs kyi bdud rtsi bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
translated: The seventy-two hundred thousand subtle channels are used for the purpose of music, producing inconceivable varieties of nectar.

original: chos kyi 'byung gnas chen po'i sa steng du 'byung zhing skye'i /
analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas chen po'i sa steng du 'byung zhing skye'i /
translated: They arise and are born on the surface of the great source of phenomena.

original: char 'bab pa'i don du bstan pa'o //
analyzed: char 'bab pa'i don du bstan pa'o //
translated: They are taught for the purpose of the rain falling.

original: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
analyzed: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
translated: Īśvara of the gods said:

original: de ltar lags mod kyang rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig po rnams kyi mtshan dang grangs 'dir mchog gi dbang phyug la bka' drin zhu'o //
analyzed: de ltar lags mod kyang rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig po rnams kyi mtshan dang grangs 'dir mchog gi dbang phyug la bka' drin zhu'o //
translated: “Although that is so, I request the supreme lord to explain the names and numbers of the thirty-one channels.”

original: bcom ldan @8b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan @8b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān replied:

original: lha'i dbang phyug /
analyzed: lha'i dbang phyug /
translated: “Īśvara of the gods,

original: sum cu rtsa gcig gi ming rnams nyon cig /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gcig gi ming rnams nyon cig /
translated: listen to the names of the thirty-one.

original: gsang ba dang / zab pa dang / sred pa dang / phra mo dang / bdud rtsi ma dang / bdud rtsi khri ma dang / dag pa ma dang / bde ba ma dang / stobs ma dang / thabs ma dang / hrud hrud ma dang /
analyzed: gsang ba dang / zab pa dang / sred pa dang / phra mo dang / bdud rtsi ma dang / bdud rtsi khri ma dang / dag pa ma dang / bde ba ma dang / stobs ma dang / thabs ma dang / hrud hrud ma dang /
translated: They are the secret, the profound, craving, subtle, nectar mother, nectar thousand mother, pure mother, bliss mother, strength mother, means mother, and the mother of the subtle.

original: ser ma dang / 'o rgyun ma dang / dga' ma dang / snum ma dang / khro ma dang / mngar ma dang / skyur ma dang / kha ba ma dang / bska ba ma dang / tshva ma dang / lan tshva ma dang / rtsub ma dang /
analyzed: ser ma dang / 'o rgyun ma dang / dga' ma dang / snum ma dang / khro ma dang / mngar ma dang / skyur ma dang / kha ba ma dang / bska ba ma dang / tshva ma dang / lan tshva ma dang / rtsub ma dang /
translated: the channel of bile, the channel of phlegm, the channel of wind, the channel of blood, the channel of pus, the channel of lymph, the channel of fat, the channel of marrow, the channel of urine, the channel of feces, the channel of semen, the channel of the womb, the channel of the heart, the channel of the lungs, the channel of the liver, the channel of the spleen, the channel of the kidneys, the channel of the small intestine, the channel of the large intestine, the channel of the stomach, the channel of the bladder, the channel of the breasts, the channel of the eyes, the channel of the ears, the channel of the nose, the channel of the tongue, the channel of the body, the channel of the arms, the channel of the legs, the channel of the hands, the channel of the feet, the channel of the yellow, the channel of the milk, the channel of the joy, the channel of the oil, the channel of the anger, the channel of the sweet, the channel of the sour, the channel of the bitter, the channel of the astringent, the channel of the salty, the channel of the alkaline, the channel of the rough,

original: dang ma dang / stobs ma dang / dga' byed ma dang / dga' sbyin ma dang / gnyid ma dang / bcad skyed ma dang / khong chud ma dang / tshe ma ste /
analyzed: dang ma dang / stobs ma dang / dga' byed ma dang / dga' sbyin ma dang / gnyid ma dang / bcad skyed ma dang / khong chud ma dang / tshe ma ste /
translated: the channel of the even, the channel of the strength, the channel of the delight, the channel of the giving joy, the channel of the sleep, the channel of the menstruation, the channel of the womb, and the channel of the life.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: These are

original: rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig ste /
analyzed: rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig ste /
translated: the thirty-one channels.

original: steng dang 'og tu 'pho ba gnyis kyi zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su tshigs rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu 'pho ba gnyis kyi zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su tshigs rgyas pa'o //
translated: The joints expand at the time of the eclipse of the moon and sun above and below.🔽Then, the stages of empowerment are explained.

original: de nas dbang gi rim pa bshad ste /🔽ji ltar yi ni go rim du //
analyzed: de nas dbang gi rim pa bshad ste / ji ltar yi ni go rim du //
translated: In the order of the syllables,

original: dbang bskur mchog ni rnyed pa gang //
analyzed: dbang bskur mchog ni rnyed pa gang //
translated: the supreme empowerment is obtained,

original: thams cad du ni nus par 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad du ni nus par 'gyur //

original: yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu //
analyzed: yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu //

original: bla mas dang por dbang bskur bya //
analyzed: bla mas dang por dbang bskur bya //

original: khrus byas mig dag ras kyis dgab //
analyzed: khrus byas mig dag ras kyis dgab //

original: snyim pa me tog gis bkang ldan; ;yon phul nas ni dga' dang bcas //
analyzed: snyim pa me tog gis bkang ldan; ;yon phul nas ni dga' dang bcas //

original: dbang bskur nas ni sangs rgyas sa //
analyzed: dbang bskur nas ni sangs rgyas sa //

original: the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur //
analyzed: the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur //

original: de bas kun tu rab @9a *//
analyzed: de bas kun tu rab @9a *//

original: 'bad de // dpal ldan dbang rgyal blang bar bya //
analyzed: 'bad de // dpal ldan dbang rgyal blang bar bya //

analyzed: dbang bskur bzhi ru phye ba ni //

analyzed: slob dpon la sogs dbye ba yin //

original: dang por slob dpon gyi ni dbang //
analyzed: dang por slob dpon gyi ni dbang //

analyzed: gnyis pa de ni gsang ba'i dbang //

original: gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang //
analyzed: gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang //

analyzed: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o //

original: bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni //
analyzed: bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni //

original: slob dpon dbang la sogs par bskur //
analyzed: slob dpon dbang la sogs par bskur //

original: rdo rje slob dpon dbang gsum du //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon dbang gsum du //

original: nam mkha' mnyam du bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: nam mkha' mnyam du bdag gis bshad //

original: de gnyis la ni bcu gcig phye //
analyzed: de gnyis la ni bcu gcig phye //

original: dbang bskur de ni rin po che //
analyzed: dbang bskur de ni rin po che //

original: khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa //
analyzed: khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa //

original: thar par 'gro ba 'grub don du //
analyzed: thar par 'gro ba 'grub don du //

original: 'di ru rim pas bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: 'di ru rim pas bdag gis bshad //

analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyud la mos pa la //

original: rnal 'byor ma la mos pa rnams //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma la mos pa rnams //

analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang ni sbyin pa'o //

original: gsang ba gnyis su dbye bar gsungs //

original: de ni phyi dang nang gis so //
analyzed: de ni phyi dang nang gis so //

original: nang gi rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud //

original: de ni gsang ba gsum du dbye //

analyzed: skye dang mdud dang de bzhin sad //

original: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go /

analyzed: gzugs bzang sngo la skal ldan ma; ;'o 'dzin mkhrang zhing 'jam la mtho //

analyzed: de lta'i rab grags 'bad de btsal //

analyzed: dbang gi don du bla mar zhu //

analyzed: bu mo yang na mna' ma 'am //

original: mkhas pas 'bad de blang bar bya //
analyzed: mkhas pas 'bad de blang bar bya //

analyzed: khu ba dang bcas gzhon nu ma //

analyzed: dbang gi man ngag gsum du bzhugs //

analyzed: nang gi yi ni brda byed pa //

analyzed: gsum dang bral ba'i gsum bdag nyid //

original: rdo rje gzhon nu mas gsal dbye //
analyzed: rdo rje gzhon nu mas gsal dbye //

analyzed: dbang gis dri ma med par byed //

analyzed: rdzogs pa'i dbang //

analyzed: yan lag de nyid dang ni bcas //

analyzed: rnyed pa med do //

analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug la //

analyzed: de kun gyis ni bdag mchod 'os //

analyzed: ma grags kyang ni grags gzugs yin //

analyzed: de ni mnar med pa ru 'gro //

analyzed: de bas kun tu 'bad pa yis //

analyzed: gus pas bla ma mchod par bya //

original: rin chen sna tshogs bzor byas legs //🔽gser gyi padma dri ma med //
analyzed: rin chen sna tshogs bzor byas legs // gser gyi padma dri ma med //
translated: Various precious things well crafted,🔽golden lotuses without stains,

original: mu tig do shal rin thang med //
analyzed: mu tig do shal rin thang med //
translated: pearl necklaces priceless,

original: sna tshogs du ma yi ni gos //
analyzed: sna tshogs du ma yi ni gos //
translated: varieties of many kinds of clothing,

original: gces pa'i btsun mo bu dang bcas //
analyzed: gces pa'i btsun mo bu dang bcas //
translated: beloved queens and sons,

original: glang po rta dang bran la sogs //
analyzed: glang po rta dang bran la sogs //
translated: elephants, horses, servants, and so on,

original: dpal ldan bla ma'i spyan snga ru //
analyzed: dpal ldan bla ma'i spyan snga ru //
translated: in the presence of the glorious guru

original: dad gus brtan pas dbul bar bya //
analyzed: dad gus brtan pas dbul bar bya //
translated: one should offer them with stable faith and respect.

original: dpal ye shes thig le las /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le las /
translated: From the glorious Wisdom-Essence:

original: yon dbul ba dang bcas pa'i dbang gi rim pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: yon dbul ba dang bcas pa'i dbang gi rim pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
translated: The third chapter on the stages of empowerment with the offering of gifts.

original: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad nyon //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad nyon //
translated: Now listen to the other explanation.

original: gnas kyi rnyed pa ji bzhin don //
analyzed: gnas kyi rnyed pa ji bzhin don //
translated: The meaning is like the acquisition of a place.

original: ka ba gcig dang sgo dgur ldan //
analyzed: ka ba gcig dang sgo dgur ldan //
translated: It has one pillar and nine doors.

original: rdo rje rtsig pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje rtsig pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
translated: It is adorned with vajra walls.

original: rdo rje'i thig dang bla re ni //
analyzed: rdo rje'i thig dang bla re ni //
translated: The vajra lines and canopies🔽are completely surrounded.

original: kun tu yongs su bskor ba yin; ;rlung la sogs pa'i rig pas dbye //
analyzed: kun tu yongs su bskor ba yin; ;rlung la sogs pa'i rig pas dbye //
translated: It is divided by the knowledge of wind and so forth.

original: 'byung ba bzhi dang ldan pa yin //
analyzed: 'byung ba bzhi dang ldan pa yin //
translated: It possesses the four elements.

original: ji snyed nam mkha'i mtha' kun tu //
analyzed: ji snyed nam mkha'i mtha' kun tu //
translated: To the extent of the limits of space,

original: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
translated: everything always exists in the nature of the self.

original: rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni //
analyzed: rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the vajra tent,

original: srung ba'i 'khor lo 'khor bzhin pa //
analyzed: srung ba'i 'khor lo 'khor bzhin pa //
translated: the protection wheel is turning.

original: rtsibs bcu pa la gser gyi mdog /
analyzed: rtsibs bcu pa la gser gyi mdog /
translated: It has ten spokes and a golden color,

original: khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'o //🔽khro bo thams cad zhal gsum pa //
analyzed: khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'o // khro bo thams cad zhal gsum pa //
translated: together with the ten wrathful ones.🔽All the wrathful ones have three faces,

original: spyan gsum pa @11a *//
analyzed: spyan gsum pa @11a *//
translated: three eyes,

original: la phyag drug pa //
analyzed: la phyag drug pa //
translated: and six arms.

original: g-yas brkyang pas bzhugs pa /🔽gsus pa rlo ba /
analyzed: g-yas brkyang pas bzhugs pa / gsus pa rlo ba /
translated: They stand with the right leg extended,🔽with distended bellies,

original: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with snake ornaments.

original: ljags 'dril ba /
analyzed: ljags 'dril ba /
translated: His tongue is rolled up.

original: mche ba 'jigs pa brtsigs pa /
analyzed: mche ba 'jigs pa brtsigs pa /
translated: His fangs are terrifying and bared.

original: dbu skra ser po gyen du 'greng ba /
analyzed: dbu skra ser po gyen du 'greng ba /
translated: His yellow hair bristles upward.

original: aag tshom dang smin ma che zhing ring ba ste /
analyzed: aag tshom dang smin ma che zhing ring ba ste /
translated: He has a long, large topknot and eyebrows.

original: shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni /🔽ser ba dang dmar po /
analyzed: shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni / ser ba dang dmar po /
translated: On the eastern spoke is black Yamântaka. His right and left faces are yellow and red.

original: phyag g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang rtse gsum pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang rtse gsum pa /
translated: In his two right hands he holds a sword and a trident.

original: phyag g-yon gnyis na thod pa dang dbyug pa'o //🔽lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po g-yas kyi zhal dmar ba /
analyzed: phyag g-yon gnyis na thod pa dang dbyug pa'o // lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po g-yas kyi zhal dmar ba /
translated: In his two left hands he holds a skull cup and a club.

original: g-yon sngo ba /🔽phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang ral gri /
analyzed: g-yon sngo ba / phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang ral gri /
translated: On the southern spoke is white Prajñântaka. His right face is red and his left face is blue.🔽In his two right hands he holds a club and a sword.

original: phyag g-yon pa gnyis na mtshon rtse gcig dang mgo bo'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa gnyis na mtshon rtse gcig dang mgo bo'o //
translated: In his two left hands he holds a spear and a head.

original: nub tu padma mthar byed dmar po zhal g-yas dkar zhing g-yon sngon po /
analyzed: nub tu padma mthar byed dmar po zhal g-yas dkar zhing g-yon sngon po /
translated: In the west is red Padmântaka. His right face is white and his left face is blue.

original: g-yas dang g-yon gyi bzhin ral gri dang 'khor lo dang / zla ba phyed pa dang ri rab zur brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi bzhin ral gri dang 'khor lo dang / zla ba phyed pa dang ri rab zur brgyad pa'o //
translated: crescent moon and eight-peaked Mount Meru.

original: byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gnyis ni /
analyzed: byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gnyis ni /
translated: In the north is blue Vighnāntakṛt, with the two right and left faces

original: dkar po dang dmar po'o //
analyzed: dkar po dang dmar po'o //
translated: white and red.🔽The right and left hands hold a vajra cross and sword,

original: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag bzhin rdo rje rgya gram dang ral gri dang / mdud thung dang dung ngo //
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag bzhin rdo rje rgya gram dang ral gri dang / mdud thung dang dung ngo //
translated: a short club and a conch.

original: me'i mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs can g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gnyis ni /
analyzed: me'i mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs can g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gnyis ni /
translated: In the southeast is Kāmarāja, with the two right and left faces

original: dkar @11b ba dang dmar ba /🔽g-yas phyag gnyis na ral gri dang rin po che /
analyzed: dkar @11b ba dang dmar ba / g-yas phyag gnyis na ral gri dang rin po che /
translated: white and red.🔽The two right hands hold a sword and jewel,

original: phyag g-yon na sta re dang mdung thung ngo //
analyzed: phyag g-yon na sta re dang mdung thung ngo //
translated: the two left hands an ax and a spear.

original: srin po'i mtshams su dbyug pa sngon po chu srin 'dzin ser po'i gzugs /
analyzed: srin po'i mtshams su dbyug pa sngon po chu srin 'dzin ser po'i gzugs /
translated: In the southwest is blue Daṇḍa, with the form of a yellow crocodile,

original: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ljang ba dang dmar ba /
analyzed: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ljang ba dang dmar ba /
translated: with the right and left faces green and red.

original: phyag g-yas gnyis na rgya gram rtse gsum dang ral gri /
analyzed: phyag g-yas gnyis na rgya gram rtse gsum dang ral gri /
translated: The two right hands hold a three-pointed vajra cross and a sword,🔽the two left hands a skull and a trident.

original: phyag g-yon gnyis na s'a la'i shing chen po dang / de bzhin du me'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yon gnyis na s'a la'i shing chen po dang / de bzhin du me'o //
translated: In his two left hands he holds a great sāla tree and a fire.

original: rlung mtshams su stobs po che du ba'i mdog /
analyzed: rlung mtshams su stobs po che du ba'i mdog /
translated: In the northeast is Mahābala, the color of smoke.

original: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni /
analyzed: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni /
translated: His right and left faces are

original: ser ba dang dmar po /
analyzed: ser ba dang dmar po /
translated: yellow and red.🔽Of his four hands, two hold a sword and a conch, and two a battle-ax and a flag.

original: phyag bzhi la ral gri dang dung dang / dgra sta dang rnga ma'o; ;dbang ldan gyi mtshams su mi g-yo mgon dkar nag zhal g-yon dmar po dang g-yas sngon po /
analyzed: phyag bzhi la ral gri dang dung dang / dgra sta dang rnga ma'o; ;dbang ldan gyi mtshams su mi g-yo mgon dkar nag zhal g-yon dmar po dang g-yas sngon po /
translated: In the northeast is Acala, white with a black face, a red left face, and a blue right face.

original: g-yas g-yon gyi phyag bzhin ral gri dang lcags kyu dang / pi wang dang rde'u chung ngo //
analyzed: g-yas g-yon gyi phyag bzhin ral gri dang lcags kyu dang / pi wang dang rde'u chung ngo //
translated: His four hands hold a sword and a goad, a lute and a skull.

original: steng du gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba sku mdog ser po g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni /
analyzed: steng du gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba sku mdog ser po g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni /
translated: Above is Uṣṇīṣa Cakravartin, yellow with a

original: sngo ba dang dkar ba /
analyzed: sngo ba dang dkar ba /
translated: blue right face and a white left face.

original: phyag bzhin 'khor lo dang ral gri dang / ka p'a la dang kha tv'am ga'o //
analyzed: phyag bzhin 'khor lo dang ral gri dang / ka p'a la dang kha tv'am ga'o //
translated: Of his four hands, two hold a wheel and a sword, and two a skull cup and a khaṭvāṅga.

original: 'og tu sum bha'i rgyal po sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo ba /
analyzed: 'og tu sum bha'i rgyal po sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo ba /
translated: Below is Sumbha King, the color of the sky.

original: g-yas kyi zhal mthon mthing chen po'i 'od can /
analyzed: g-yas kyi zhal mthon mthing chen po'i 'od can /
translated: The right face has the radiance of great sapphire.

original: g-yon pa ni /
analyzed: g-yon pa ni /
translated: The left face

original: nyi ma gzhon nu'i 'od can /🔽g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na ral gri dang lcags kyu /
analyzed: nyi ma gzhon nu'i 'od can / g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na ral gri dang lcags kyu /
translated: has the radiance of the rising sun.🔽The two right hands hold a sword and a goad.

original: g-yon gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa'o //🔽thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang @12a *//
analyzed: g-yon gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa'o // thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang @12a *//
translated: The two left hands hold a flaying knife and a skull.🔽All of them hold a vajra and

original: padma bsnams pa /
analyzed: padma bsnams pa /
translated: a lotus in the two original hands.

original: rang gi 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o //
translated: They embrace their own-radiance wisdom consorts.

original: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa ni /
translated: Rati-rāja and so forth

original: 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyi steng du'o //🔽gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang sum bha'i rgyal po ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyi steng du'o // gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang sum bha'i rgyal po ni /

original: zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du shes par bya'o //
translated: Uṣṇīṣa-cakravartin and Sumbha-rāja should be known to be on top of the moon and sun.

original: 'di 'khor lo'i lte ba gru gsum gyi gzugs te /
analyzed: 'di 'khor lo'i lte ba gru gsum gyi gzugs te /
translated: This is the form of the triangular center of the wheel.

original: ri bong can dkar po'i 'od chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
analyzed: ri bong can dkar po'i 'od chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
translated: The white radiance of the moon is the source of phenomena.

original: de'i dbus su sngar bstan pa'i 'byung ba bzhi ji lta bu'i rim pas rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa las dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang yangs pa chen po'i 'phar ma gnyis nyi ma'i gdan du sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi lte
analyzed: de'i dbus su sngar bstan pa'i 'byung ba bzhi ji lta bu'i rim pas rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa las dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang yangs pa chen po'i 'phar ma gnyis nyi ma'i gdan du sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi lte
translated: In the center of that, by the sequence of the four elements as previously explained, from the transformation of Vairocana, there is a great, vast celestial mansion with eight charnel grounds, with two upper stories, a sun seat, and an eight-petaled multicolored lotus in the center.

original: bar 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi bde byed ma'i steng du tshul dang thigs pa'i rang gi ngo bo a'a li dang k'a li gnyis las byung ba /
analyzed: bar 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi bde byed ma'i steng du tshul dang thigs pa'i rang gi ngo bo a'a li dang k'a li gnyis las byung ba /
translated: On that, Bhairava and Kālarātri Kalā, from the two syllables ā and kā, which are the nature of the mode and the drop, arise.

original: mam h'um las dpal ye shes thig le phyag rgya chen pos 'khyud cing zhal brgyad pa /
analyzed: mam h'um las dpal ye shes thig le phyag rgya chen pos 'khyud cing zhal brgyad pa /
translated: From maṃ and hūṃ, there is glorious Jñānadākinī, embraced by the great seal of glorious Jñānatilaka, with eight faces.

original: phyag brgyad g-yas brkyang ba /
analyzed: phyag brgyad g-yas brkyang ba /
translated: She has eight arms, with the right legs extended.

original: zhal bzhi ni /
analyzed: zhal bzhi ni /
translated: The four faces are

original: nag pa dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang gu'o //
analyzed: nag pa dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang gu'o //
translated: black, yellow, red, and green.

original: gzhan bzhi ni /
analyzed: gzhan bzhi ni /
translated: The other four are

original: autpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'o; ;rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / rde'u chung dang / ka p'a la dang / khatv'am ga dang / ral gri dang / mda' gzhu'o //
analyzed: autpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'o; ;rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / rde'u chung dang / ka p'a la dang / khatv'am ga dang / ral gri dang / mda' gzhu'o //
translated: He has the color of a blue lotus.🔽He has a vajra, a bell, a skull, a kapala, a khaṭvāṅga, a sword, and a bow and arrow.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba tshes pas ral pa'i dbu rgyan @12b dang / dpral bar thod pa'i steng du mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can no //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba tshes pas ral pa'i dbu rgyan @12b dang / dpral bar thod pa'i steng du mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can no //
translated: He has a crown of matted hair with a variegated vajra and a crescent moon, and on his forehead, on top of a skull, is a crest of Akṣobhya.

original: phyag rgya drug gis sku bcings pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis sku bcings pa //
translated: He is bound with the six mudras.

original: rgyu mas brgyus pa'i mgo bo chen po'i do shal gyis sku brgyan pa /
analyzed: rgyu mas brgyus pa'i mgo bo chen po'i do shal gyis sku brgyan pa /
translated: His body is adorned with a garland of large heads strung with intestines.

original: tshangs pa'i pags pa'i rked pa'i sham thabs can gyi skur bzhengs shing he ha'i gad rgyangs dang phem ka ra'i tshol ba'i sgra chen po'i nga ro bsgrags shing brjod pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i g-yul sa bye ba'i grangs kyi thod pa'i lto ba brlag par mdzad pa /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i pags pa'i rked pa'i sham thabs can gyi skur bzhengs shing he ha'i gad rgyangs dang phem ka ra'i tshol ba'i sgra chen po'i nga ro bsgrags shing brjod pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i g-yul sa bye ba'i grangs kyi thod pa'i lto ba brlag par mdzad pa /
translated: He has a loincloth of Brahma’s skin. He arises in a body that proclaims the great sound of the laughter of “he he” and the sound of “pheṃ pheṃ,” merely by which the bellies of the skulls of ten million Brahma battlefields are destroyed.

original: mi bzad pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / lce spyang gi tshogs 'jigs su rung ba dang / sha za'i tshogs ha har dgod pa dang / nag po'i me can gyi dur khrod chen po brgyad na 'jigs byed kyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'i gar byed pa'o //🔽dpal ye shes thig le las /
analyzed: mi bzad pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / lce spyang gi tshogs 'jigs su rung ba dang / sha za'i tshogs ha har dgod pa dang / nag po'i me can gyi dur khrod chen po brgyad na 'jigs byed kyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'i gar byed pa'o // dpal ye shes thig le las /
translated: In the eight great charnel grounds of the terrifying howling of jackals, the terrifying assembly of wolves, the terrifying assembly of rākṣasas, and the terrifying black fire, he performs the dance endowed with the nine expressions of the terrifying.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
translated: This is the fourth chapter on the generation of the maṇḍala cakra in the glorious Jñāna-tilakṣa.

original: da ni sngags mchog bshad bya ba //
analyzed: da ni sngags mchog bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, the supreme mantra is to be explained,

original: sgrub pa po ni 'grub 'gyur ba //
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni 'grub 'gyur ba //
translated: by which the adept will attain accomplishment.

original: sa yi cha ni mnyam pa'i mchog /🔽sbrang rtsi ga pur gyis ni byug /
analyzed: sa yi cha ni mnyam pa'i mchog / sbrang rtsi ga pur gyis ni byug /
translated: The best place is a level spot,🔽anointed with honey and camphor,

original: dri zhim pa yi me tog bkram //
analyzed: dri zhim pa yi me tog bkram //
translated: strewn with fragrant flowers,

original: me tog gis ni chal par dgram //
analyzed: me tog gis ni chal par dgram //
translated: and strewn with flowers to the knee.

original: chu ngogs yang na thang stong du //
analyzed: chu ngogs yang na thang stong du //
translated: On the bank of a river or in an empty field,🔽encircled by vajra threads,

original: rdo rje skud pa yis ni bskor; ;mig mdzes rdo rje gzhon nu ma //
analyzed: rdo rje skud pa yis ni bskor; ;mig mdzes rdo rje gzhon nu ma //
translated: a beautiful-eyed young maiden,

original: zla ba nyi mas padma khengs //
analyzed: zla ba nyi mas padma khengs //
translated: the lotus filled with moon and sun,

original: lang tsho gsar la reg bya 'jam //
analyzed: lang tsho gsar la reg bya 'jam //
translated: youthful, with soft touch,

original: dang po mkhas pas 'jug par bya //
analyzed: dang po mkhas pas 'jug par bya //
translated: The wise one should enter first.

original: sngags kyi gnas kyi lugs ji @13a *//
analyzed: sngags kyi gnas kyi lugs ji @13a *//
translated: The system of the abode of mantra

original: bzhin; ;legs dgyes shin tu sbyor bar bya //
analyzed: bzhin; ;legs dgyes shin tu sbyor bar bya //
translated: is well-pleasing, thoroughly applied.

original: de yi sbyor ba gang zhig 'byung //
analyzed: de yi sbyor ba gang zhig 'byung //
translated: What is its application?

original: kha dang sa sogs mchod par bya //
analyzed: kha dang sa sogs mchod par bya //
translated: One should make offerings with the mouth, earth, and so forth.

original: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bya //
analyzed: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bya //
translated: One should make an eight-petaled lotus,

original: rdo rje yi ni phur bu bcu //
analyzed: rdo rje yi ni phur bu bcu //
translated: and with the ten vajra daggers,

original: mkhas pas khro ba'i sngags kyis gdab //
analyzed: mkhas pas khro ba'i sngags kyis gdab //
translated: the wise one should strike with the mantra of wrath.

original: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas nas //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas nas //
translated: Having made the ālikāli equal,

original: 'dab ma kun la rim pas dgod //
analyzed: 'dab ma kun la rim pas dgod //
translated: one should arrange it on all the petals in order.

original: a'a li ye shes 'dab ma gcig /
analyzed: a'a li ye shes 'dab ma gcig /
translated: The ālikāli is known to have one wisdom petal

original: k'a li 'dab ma bdun du dran //
analyzed: k'a li 'dab ma bdun du dran //
translated: and seven action petals.

original: 'dab ma re re yi ge lnga //
analyzed: 'dab ma re re yi ge lnga //
translated: On each petal are five syllables,

original: lnga pa lnga ni lnga la'o //
analyzed: lnga pa lnga ni lnga la'o //
translated: and the fifth of the fives is on the fifth.

original: 'dab ma gnyis su bzhi gnyis te //
analyzed: 'dab ma gnyis su bzhi gnyis te //

original: phat phat phat phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: phat phat phat phat sv'ah'a /

original: aom ma h'a kro dhe shva r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ma h'a bee be de spha ra na ra ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ma h'a kalp'anta aaghe sa ma pra bh'a ya h'um phat sv'h'a /🔽aom dza ya bi dza y'att'atta h'a s'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ma h'a gho ra gho re shva r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ma h'a b'i ra b'i re shva r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ma h'a kro dhe shva r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom ma h'a bee be de spha ra na ra ya h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom ma h'a kalp'anta aaghe sa ma pra bh'a ya h'um phat sv'h'a / aom dza ya bi dza y'att'atta h'a s'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom ma h'a gho ra gho re shva r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom ma h'a b'i ra b'i re shva r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ mahākrodheśvarāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ mahāvairiśvaraṇāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ mahākālapāṇi aghaṃ samaprabhāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ jaya vijaya ṭaṭa ṭaṭa hāsāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ mahāghoraghorīśvarāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ mahāvirāvirīśvarāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽

original: aom ma h'a ru dhi r'anta m'a l'a dha r'a ya h'um phat sv'h'a /🔽aom soo ma s'u rya aagni lo tsa t'a y'a h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom a'a ka sho da r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ma h'a s'a ga ra ko ke ni h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ha na ha na h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom da ha da ha h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom pa tsa pa tsa h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ma da ma da h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ma h'a ru dhi r'anta m'a l'a dha r'a ya h'um phat sv'h'a /🔽aom soo ma s'u rya aagni lo tsa t'a y'a h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom a'a ka sho da r'a ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ma h'a s'a ga ra ko ke ni h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ha na ha na h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom da ha da ha h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom pa tsa pa tsa h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ma da ma da h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ mahā rudhira antarmālādhārāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ somasūryāgni locanāyāṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ ākāśodarāya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ mahāsāgara kokanidhe hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ hana hana hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ daha daha hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ paca paca hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ mada mada hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽

original: aom bi dham sa ya bi dhvam  sa ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom bi dham sa ya bi dhvam  sa ya h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vidhaṃsaya vidhaṃsaya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

analyzed: aom @15b  svah'a k'a l'a gr'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat/

analyzed: aom aa pa ra ma na bu g'a ya h'um h'um phat/

analyzed: ye shes drug gi mchog sngags dbang //

analyzed: de yi sngags ni bdag gis bshad //

analyzed: aatta aatta h'a sa /

analyzed: h'u lu h'u lu /

original: bi kra ma bi kra ma /
analyzed: bi kra ma bi kra ma /

original: bar du ming ni spel ba 'o //
analyzed: bar du ming ni spel ba 'o //

analyzed: rdo rje gsum pa ye shes rgyal //

original: aom a'a: h'um ni sngags kyi mchog /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um ni sngags kyi mchog /

original: dpal ye shes thig le las /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le las /

analyzed: sngags btu ba zhes pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////

analyzed: de nas mchod sbyin rab bdag bshad //

analyzed: gnas la sogs pa'i rim pas sbyor //

analyzed: rnam shes la sogs bye brag tu //

original: rnam par shes pa @16a *//
analyzed: rnam par shes pa @16a *//

analyzed: longs spyod dang // snang dang nam mkha' ye shes bzhin //

analyzed: sku brgyad kyi ni bye brag tu //

analyzed: dngos po rten dang rnam par 'byed //

original: ji bzhin 'dod ba sdud pa ni //
analyzed: ji bzhin 'dod ba sdud pa ni //

analyzed: mchod sbyin rnal 'byor ma dkyil 'khor //

analyzed: aoodyan la sogs gnas su ni //

original: legs dgyes ma sogs lha mo kun //
analyzed: legs dgyes ma sogs lha mo kun //

original: k'a li ye shes yig mchog sbyin //
analyzed: k'a li ye shes yig mchog sbyin //

original: phyi dang nang du bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi dang nang du bya ba'o //

analyzed: mchod sbyin byas na sbyin pa che //

analyzed: 'bras bu bkra shis ldan pa skye // sems can rnams kyi bye brag tu //
translated: will produce an auspicious result.🔽The various methods for the distinctions of sentient beings

analyzed: sna tshogs thabs ni rab tu bshad //
