analyzed: kha cig la ni 'dul ba'i thabs //

analyzed: kha cig rnams la mdo sde'o //

analyzed: la la pha rol phyin pa'i lam /

analyzed: kha cig la ni sngags kyi mchog / rab 'bring tha ma'i bye brag tu //

analyzed: thar par 'gro ba'i thabs yin no //

analyzed: blo gros che yang theg gzhan gyis //

analyzed: grangs med gsum gyis sangs rgyas yin //

analyzed: sngags kyi theg pa la mos na //

analyzed: tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas so; ;yang ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma khyod smos ci dgos //

original: yang na lus ni spangs ma thag /
analyzed: yang na lus ni spangs ma thag /

original: bla na med pa'i ye shes dag /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i ye shes dag /

original: brtson par mi ldan pas kyang rnyed //
analyzed: brtson par mi ldan pas kyang rnyed //

analyzed: brtson 'grus ldan pas smos ci dgos // brtan pa'i brtson pas don thams cad //
translated: What need is there to mention one who is diligent?🔽Through the diligence of the steadfast,

original: 'bad pa med kyang 'grub pa yin //
analyzed: 'bad pa med kyang 'grub pa yin //

original: don kun grub pa'i bsod nams can //
analyzed: don kun grub pa'i bsod nams can //
translated: The one with the merit of accomplishing all goals,

original: rtog med nyon @16b mongs med pa'o //
analyzed: rtog med nyon @16b mongs med pa'o //

original: gang zhig las ni ci byed pa //
analyzed: gang zhig las ni ci byed pa //
translated: Whatever actions one performs,

original: de ni bsod nams 'phel ba yin //
analyzed: de ni bsod nams 'phel ba yin //

original: 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang gang spyod //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang gang spyod //
translated: Whatever enjoyments of desire one engages in,

original: de kun mchod pa la sogs yin //
analyzed: de kun mchod pa la sogs yin //

original: de ni mchod sbyin 'phel ba yin //
analyzed: de ni mchod sbyin 'phel ba yin //

original: mchod las ye shes 'bras bu rnyed //
analyzed: mchod las ye shes 'bras bu rnyed //

original: de ni mchod sbyin yang dag pa //
analyzed: de ni mchod sbyin yang dag pa //
translated: That is the perfect sacrifice.

original: rgyud kun tu ni rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: rgyud kun tu ni rnyed dka' ba //
translated: Difficult to find in all the tantras,

original: 'bras bu chen po thams cad sbyin //
analyzed: 'bras bu chen po thams cad sbyin //

original: rnal 'byor ma yis gzhi yi mchog /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yis gzhi yi mchog /

original: dpal ye shes thig le las /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le las /
translated: From the glorious Essence of Wisdom,

original: mchod sbyin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
analyzed: mchod sbyin gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
translated: the sixth chapter, called “The Procedure of Sacrifice.”

original: de nas mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
translated: Now, the procedure of worship

original: sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa //
translated: destroys all sins.

original: yid 'phrog lha yi me tog gis //
analyzed: yid 'phrog lha yi me tog gis //
translated: With the divine flower that captivates the mind,

original: zla ba nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan //
translated: endowed with the light of the moon and sun,

original: me dang sgron ma rmad du byung //
analyzed: me dang sgron ma rmad du byung //
translated: the marvelous lamp and fire,

original: mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la mchod bya //
analyzed: mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la mchod bya //
translated: one should worship the mandala of the sacrifice.

original: dbang ni mar ngo'i dang po yi //
analyzed: dbang ni mar ngo'i dang po yi //
translated: The empowerment is on the first day of the dark fortnight,

original: bcu drug pa yi dang po yis //
analyzed: bcu drug pa yi dang po yis //
translated: with the first of the sixteenth,

original: gnyis pa yi ni rab thim gsum //
analyzed: gnyis pa yi ni rab thim gsum //
translated: the second is the excellent dissolution, the third

original: bcu drug dang po'i 'og ma yis //
analyzed: bcu drug dang po'i 'og ma yis //
translated: with the first of the sixteenth below,

original: gsum pa yi ni longs spyod yin //
analyzed: gsum pa yi ni longs spyod yin //
translated: the third is the enjoyment.

original: bcu drug pa yi gsum pas so //🔽bzhi pa yi ni thim pa 'byung //
analyzed: bcu drug pa yi gsum pas so // bzhi pa yi ni thim pa 'byung //

original: gsum pa yi ni 'og mas so //🔽lnga pa yi ni longs spyod yin //
analyzed: gsum pa yi ni 'og mas so // lnga pa yi ni longs spyod yin //
translated: arises by means of the last of the third.🔽The enjoyment of the fifth

original: bcu drug pa yi lnga pas so //🔽drug pa yi ni thim pa 'byung //
analyzed: bcu drug pa yi lnga pas so // drug pa yi ni thim pa 'byung //
translated: is by means of the fifth of the sixteenth.🔽The dissolution of the sixth

original: bcu drug pa yi drug pas so //
analyzed: bcu drug pa yi drug pas so //
translated: is by means of the sixth of the sixteenth.

original: bdun pa yi ni rab mchod dbang //
analyzed: bdun pa yi ni rab mchod dbang //
translated: The empowerment of the seventh is the supreme offering,🔽which is the eighth of the waning moon,

original: mar ngo yi ni brgyad pa dang // dbyangs yig brgyad pos mchod par bya //
analyzed: mar ngo yi ni brgyad pa dang // dbyangs yig brgyad pos mchod par bya //
translated: offered with the eighth vowel [i].

original: dgu pa yi ni longs spyod 'byung //
analyzed: dgu pa yi ni longs spyod 'byung //
translated: The enjoyment of the ninth

original: bcu @17a *// drug pa yi dgu pas so //🔽bcu pa yi ni thim pa 'byung //
analyzed: bcu @17a *// drug pa yi dgu pas so // bcu pa yi ni thim pa 'byung //
translated: is by means of the ninth of the sixteenth.🔽The dissolution of the tenth

original: dbyangs yig gi ni bcu pas so //🔽bcu gcig pa yi dbang yin te //
analyzed: dbyangs yig gi ni bcu pas so // bcu gcig pa yi dbang yin te //
translated: is by means of the tenth vowel [i].🔽The eleventh is the empowerment,

original: bcu gcig pa yis mchod par bya //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa yis mchod par bya //
translated: which is offered by means of the eleventh [i].

original: bcu gnyis kyi ni thim pa 'byung //
analyzed: bcu gnyis kyi ni thim pa 'byung //
translated: The dissolution of the twelfth

original: dbyangs yig bcu gnyis po yis so //
analyzed: dbyangs yig bcu gnyis po yis so //
translated: is by means of the twelfth vowel [i].

original: bcu gsum pa yi longs spyod ni //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa yi longs spyod ni //
translated: The enjoyment of the thirteenth

original: de gnyis kyis ni mchod par bya //
analyzed: de gnyis kyis ni mchod par bya //
translated: is offered by means of the twelfth [i].🔽The dissolution of the fourteenth

original: bcu bzhi yis ni thim par 'gyur //
analyzed: bcu bzhi yis ni thim par 'gyur //
translated: is by means of the fourteenth [i].

original: dbyangs yig bdun pa gnyis kyis mchod //
analyzed: dbyangs yig bdun pa gnyis kyis mchod //
translated: The seventh vowel [u] is offered twice.

original: nya gang ba la dbang yin te //
analyzed: nya gang ba la dbang yin te //
translated: The full moon is the empowerment,

original: dbyangs yig bco lnga pa yis so //
analyzed: dbyangs yig bco lnga pa yis so //
translated: with the fifteenth vowel [o].

original: byang chub sems 'byung mchod pa yin //
analyzed: byang chub sems 'byung mchod pa yin //
translated: The arising of bodhicitta is the offering.

original: yar ngo mar ngo bye brag tu //
analyzed: yar ngo mar ngo bye brag tu //
translated: The waxing and waning are distinct.

original: shes rab thabs ni rab tu sbyor //
analyzed: shes rab thabs ni rab tu sbyor //
translated: Wisdom and method are well joined.

original: sku gsum ye shes dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: sku gsum ye shes dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: The maṇḍala of the gnosis of the three kāyas

original: tshes dang yi ge sngags kyis su //
analyzed: tshes dang yi ge sngags kyis su //
translated: is the day and the syllables of the mantras.

original: ri bong can ni 'phel bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ri bong can ni 'phel bar 'gyur //
translated: The moon will increase.

original: thig le nam mkha' 'gog pa yis //
analyzed: thig le nam mkha' 'gog pa yis //

original: rang bzhin de ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rang bzhin de ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: That nature will arise.

original: thig le'i rang bzhin ye shes ni //
analyzed: thig le'i rang bzhin ye shes ni //
translated: The gnosis of the nature of the bindu

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang rnyed dka'//

analyzed: bdag gi bka' drin rang bzhin myur //

analyzed: the tshom med par rnyed pa yi //

original: blun po gang gis bdag mi shes //
analyzed: blun po gang gis bdag mi shes //

analyzed: bsam gtan rags la rtag mos pa; ;de rnams kun ni grub pa med //

original: lha yi dbang phyug bden pa 'o //
analyzed: lha yi dbang phyug bden pa 'o //

analyzed: sa kun dbang phyug gi bdag po //

analyzed: sa kun dbang phyug mnga' bdag po //

original: sa kun dbang phyug gi rgyal po //
analyzed: sa kun dbang phyug gi rgyal po //

analyzed: @17b thams cad bdag nyid kun nang bdag /

analyzed: thams cad khyab pa rtag tu stong //

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa //

original: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin grags //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin grags //

analyzed: 'gro med 'gro la bdag nyid rol //

analyzed: mchog gi nam mkha' mtha' med pa //

analyzed: mtshan nyid dang bral gzhi dang bral //

analyzed: lha yi dbang rnams thub dbang rnams //

analyzed: rdo rje can yang rnyed dka' ba //

analyzed: rdo rje can dang sangs rgyas kun //

original: rnam pa mchog gi ye shes sku //
analyzed: rnam pa mchog gi ye shes sku //

analyzed: sus kyang sla ba ma yin no //

analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le las /

analyzed: mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////

analyzed: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain

analyzed: sbyin sreg sdig pa 'jig byed pa //

analyzed: zhi ba'i ho ma khung zlum po ste //

analyzed: rgyas pa yi ni gru bzhi'i //

analyzed: dkar po ser dang de bzhin dmar //

analyzed: nag po 'di ni rim pas so //

analyzed: rgya mtsho me dang mig zla ba //

analyzed: lha yi dbang phyug tshad yin no //

analyzed: gzhan kun gyi ni rim pas gcig /

analyzed: sngar grub kyis ni gzhan mi 'grub //

original: hom khung re rer snying gar pad //
analyzed: hom khung re rer snying gar pad //

original: rigs kyi las kyi go rim mo //
analyzed: rigs kyi las kyi go rim mo //

analyzed: de steng sna tshogs rdo rje ste // 'od zer lnga @18a *//

analyzed: dang ldan pa'o //

original: lte ba'i nang du me lha ni //
analyzed: lte ba'i nang du me lha ni //

analyzed: zhal gsum pa dang phyag bzhi pa //

analyzed: sku mdog ser po spyan zlum pa //

analyzed: ral pa'i cod pan gyis ni brgyan //

analyzed: 'bar ba'i mche ba 'jigs pa che //

analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung du ni bzhugs //

analyzed: snying ga ru ni me yi lha //

analyzed: lca bdun 'od ldan gsal bar 'byung //

analyzed: cod pan rin chen 'byung ldan mgon //

analyzed: thig les dbus su me yin no //

analyzed: tshur gshegs 'od zer cher ldan pa //

analyzed: 'dod pa'i don kun grub dbang po //

analyzed: aom bhurbhu wa sv'ah'a /

analyzed: rang byung chen po bcom ldan 'das //

analyzed: me lha las kun sgrub byed pa //

analyzed: 'dir ni bdag la nye bar bzhugs //

analyzed: me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so //

analyzed: de nas mchod yon dang / nye reg dang / 'thor 'thung ngo //

analyzed: aom hrim hrim/ mchod yon gyi sngags so //

original: aom bh'i bh'i /
analyzed: aom bh'i bh'i /

original: nye reg gi sngags so //
analyzed: nye reg gi sngags so //

analyzed: aa bhoksha aa bhoksha /

original: 'thor 'thung gi sngags so //
analyzed: 'thor 'thung gi sngags so //

analyzed: de nas gdan dbul ba ni / mdzub mo lu gu rgyud byas nas //

analyzed: bar ma sbyar byad kyi ni gzugs // srin lag mig gi bye brag tu //

analyzed: mthe chung mthe bong zlum po ste //

analyzed: gdan dbul ba yi phyag rgya'o // mkhas pa yis ni yo byad kun //

original: dang po nye ba nyid du bya //
analyzed: dang po nye ba nyid du bya //

analyzed: dka' ba med par ji ltar @18b rnyed; ;de ni de nyid rab grub bya //

original: sgrub pa'i dbang po yon tan ldan //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i dbang po yon tan ldan //

analyzed: sngags dang rgyud kyi thos pa che //

analyzed: sngags kyi bzlas la gcig tu mos //

analyzed: yid mi 'phrog cing gsol ba'o // thig le tshul ni ye shes che //

analyzed: bye brag shes pa rin chen rigs //

analyzed: rigs lnga'i gzhon nu ma yi lnga //

analyzed: yid dga'i khu ba yis ni tshim //

original: spyan ring ma dang dag pa ma //
analyzed: spyan ring ma dang dag pa ma //

original: 'o 'dzin sra zhing 'jam la mtho //
analyzed: 'o 'dzin sra zhing 'jam la mtho //

original: sbyin sreg gnas su gar dang ldan //
analyzed: sbyin sreg gnas su gar dang ldan //

original: gcer bu dang ni skra grol ba //
analyzed: gcer bu dang ni skra grol ba //

original: sbyin sreg las su don bsgrub phyir //
analyzed: sbyin sreg las su don bsgrub phyir //

analyzed: rigs lnga'i bu mo gzhug par bya //

original: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //

analyzed: bla ma nyid kyis dang por mchod //

original: brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pas //
analyzed: brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pas //

analyzed: 'dzin pa 'dir ni mi bya 'o //

original: rtog pa'i 'byung pos zin pa la //
analyzed: rtog pa'i 'byung pos zin pa la //

original: sna tshogs thabs ni bdag gis bstan //
analyzed: sna tshogs thabs ni bdag gis bstan //

original: don dam du ni phyi don med //
analyzed: don dam du ni phyi don med //

original: nang gi ma yin bar ma yin //
analyzed: nang gi ma yin bar ma yin //

original: rdul med rnam par rdul med dag /
analyzed: rdul med rnam par rdul med dag /

original: stong pa dang ni stong min bral //
analyzed: stong pa dang ni stong min bral //

original: rang rig ngo bo rang rig bral //
analyzed: rang rig ngo bo rang rig bral //

original: ngag gi lam gyis mi rnyed do //
analyzed: ngag gi lam gyis mi rnyed do //

original: phung po khams ni rnam par rtogs //
analyzed: phung po khams ni rnam par rtogs //

original: lha yi dbang phyug gang zhig sreg /
analyzed: lha yi dbang phyug gang zhig sreg /

original: de ni me yi don dam par //
analyzed: de ni me yi don dam par //

original: lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o //

original: thams cad rnam pa mchog gis rdzogs //
analyzed: thams cad rnam pa mchog gis rdzogs //

original: chos kun gyi ni nang na bzhugs //
analyzed: chos kun gyi ni nang na bzhugs //

original: kun rdzob rnam pas gzugs su ni //
analyzed: kun rdzob rnam pas gzugs su ni //

analyzed: lha yi dbang phyug kun brtags yin //

original: kun @19a *// brtags ye shes sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: kun @19a *// brtags ye shes sbyor ba yis //

original: rim pas gnas ni rnyed bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rim pas gnas ni rnyed bar 'gyur //

original: de bas kun nas 'bad pa yis //
analyzed: de bas kun nas 'bad pa yis //

original: rnam pa thams cad mchog gi rgyur //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mchog gi rgyur //
translated: for the sake of the cause of the best of all aspects,

original: rang dang gzhan gyi grub don du //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi grub don du //
translated: for the sake of accomplishing one's own and others' goals,

original: mchod sbyin sbyin sreg gtor ma bya //
analyzed: mchod sbyin sbyin sreg gtor ma bya //

analyzed: bsod nams tshogs ni 'phel phyir dang // sems can phan don de dag bya //
translated: and for the benefit of sentient beings, perform those.

translated: sesame, barley, wheat, rice, bogali, mustard seeds, all medicines, jatiphala, goyusha fruit, shali rice, nagakesara,

analyzed: gur gum dang / tsandan dang / ga pur dang / 'o ma dang / zho dang / thug pa dang / bska ba dang / la du dang / 'khur ba la sogs pa dang / gu gul dang / si hla dang / gu gul dkar po dang /
translated: saliva, white guggula,🔽the ten branches, and so forth, and flowers, incense, lamps, perfume, food offerings, arrows, silk, and so forth.

analyzed: yan lag bcu pa la sogs pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / dri dang / lha bshos dang / mda' dang / dar la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / me thab kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams kyi bye brag tu bum pa kun la sman sna tshogs dang /
translated: In the cardinal and intermediate directions of the maṇḍala of the hearth, in each of the vases, fill the belly with various medicines

analyzed: kha rgyan gyis brgyan cing dri zhim pa'i chus lto ba bkang la dar sna tshogs kyis mgrin pa brgyan pa'o //

analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad la bya'o //
translated: This is for all activities such as pacifying and so forth.

analyzed: rgyas pa la ni gser gyi 'od //

original: thams cad kun gyis rab tu brtag /
analyzed: thams cad kun gyis rab tu brtag /

original: dbang @19b la thams cad 'od dmar po //
analyzed: dbang @19b la thams cad 'od dmar po //

original: zho dang 'o ma gnyis spangs pa //
analyzed: zho dang 'o ma gnyis spangs pa //

original: yungs nag dang ni sbrul nag po'i //
analyzed: yungs nag dang ni sbrul nag po'i //

original: bags ba bya rog gi ni mchu //
analyzed: bags ba bya rog gi ni mchu //

original: bya rog nag po mi nam  snying //
analyzed: bya rog nag po mi nam  snying //
translated: a black crow, a human heart,

original: klad pa rgyu ma rkang mar mgo /
analyzed: klad pa rgyu ma rkang mar mgo /
translated: the brain, the intestines, marrow, and the head,

original: thams cad nag po yi ni mdog /
analyzed: thams cad nag po yi ni mdog /
translated: all the color of black,

original: khyi dag gi ni mjug ma 'o //
analyzed: khyi dag gi ni mjug ma 'o //
translated: and the tail of a dog.

original: yungs nag mar khu mar khu che //
analyzed: yungs nag mar khu mar khu che //

analyzed: yi dvags gzhi dang mar khu dang // phyed tshig yi dvags gyi ni ras //

analyzed: rus tshig bud shing tshig pa dang // tsher ma rno la bzang ba dang // tsher ma'i me tog ba ru ra //

analyzed: thug pa nag po ma bsres pa //

analyzed: drag po la ni rab tu brtag /

original: gzhan min dpa' bo'i dbang phyug bsam //
analyzed: gzhan min dpa' bo'i dbang phyug bsam //

analyzed: drag po la sogs su ni bya //

original: rang gi de nyid zhi la sogs //
analyzed: rang gi de nyid zhi la sogs //

analyzed: phyag rgya la sogs rgyan dang ldan //

analyzed: mar gsar dri ma med pa dang // skyon dang bral ba'i me tog shing //

analyzed: gsar pa skam zhing dri zhim pa //

original: du ba med cing skyon dang bral //
analyzed: du ba med cing skyon dang bral //

original: thams cad la ni khru re'i tshad //
analyzed: thams cad la ni khru re'i tshad //

original: las la mkhas pas de ltar bya //
analyzed: las la mkhas pas de ltar bya //

original: yang ni yam shing rab tu bstan //
analyzed: yang ni yam shing rab tu bstan //
translated: Moreover, the firewood is well-taught,

original: ji ltar rnyed pa 'bad pas so //
analyzed: ji ltar rnyed pa 'bad pas so //
translated: as much as is obtained with effort.

original: sha mi sha dang / sha mo ka dang / sha ma ba sha ka dang / aa shvadtha dang / pa la sha dang / n+ya gro dha dang / dur ba dang / aa ba marga dang / pi sal dang / kha di ra dang /
analyzed: sha mi sha dang / sha mo ka dang / sha ma ba sha ka dang / aa shvadtha dang / pa la sha dang / n+ya gro dha dang / dur ba dang / aa ba marga dang / pi sal dang / kha di ra dang /
translated: Sisu, sisuka, sisuvasaka, ashvattha, palasha, nyagrodha, durva, avamargha, pishta, khadhira,

analyzed: tsam pa ka dang / aa sho ka de rnams sor brgyad pa'i tshad do //

original: dgang gzar blugs gzar mar gyi snod //
analyzed: dgang gzar blugs gzar mar gyi snod //

analyzed: rin po che ru ji ltar bstan //
translated: how are they taught to be precious?

original: lag pa yi ni dbyug pa tshad //
analyzed: lag pa yi ni dbyug pa tshad //

analyzed: @20a *// 'bad pa yis ni dgang gzar bya //

analyzed: dgang gzar ji bzhin blugs gzar te //

original: mar khu'i snod ni de dang mnyam //
analyzed: mar khu'i snod ni de dang mnyam //

analyzed: gru gsum zlum po'i rnam pa dang // rdo rje yis ni rnam par brgyan //

original: dgang gzar gyi ni kha zhes bya //
analyzed: dgang gzar gyi ni kha zhes bya //

original: sor drug pa yi tshad du ni //
analyzed: sor drug pa yi tshad du ni //

original: mgo bo yang ni de bzhin bya //
analyzed: mgo bo yang ni de bzhin bya //

original: thams cad kun tu gru bzhi bya //
analyzed: thams cad kun tu gru bzhi bya //

original: sna tshogs rdo rje snying ga ru //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje snying ga ru //

analyzed: lte ba padma yis ni brgyan //

analyzed: chu srin kha nas byung ba yi //

original: rtse dgu pa yi rdo rje yis //
analyzed: rtse dgu pa yi rdo rje yis //

original: dgang gzar gyi ni mtha' ru ldan //
analyzed: dgang gzar gyi ni mtha' ru ldan //

analyzed: blugs gzar pa yi mig dang 'dra; ;yang na de ni padmas so //

analyzed: nang gi gting ring gsal ba dang // ha cang ring dang thung ma yin //

analyzed: rdo rje phra mos nang du brgyan //

original: mar zhu'i snod ni zlum por grags //
analyzed: mar zhu'i snod ni zlum por grags //

original: lte ba ring zhing dri ma med //
analyzed: lte ba ring zhing dri ma med //

original: rdo rje la sogs rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs rgyan dang ldan //

original: lci ba dang ni yang pa spang //
analyzed: lci ba dang ni yang pa spang //

original: zhi ba la sogs bye brag tu //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs bye brag tu //

original: bzhi ru dbye ba bdag gis bstan //
analyzed: bzhi ru dbye ba bdag gis bstan //
translated: I will teach the fourfold division.🔽“That of wrath is in the charnel ground,

original: drag po de ni dur khrod du; ;dbang ni chu yi ngogs su bya //
analyzed: drag po de ni dur khrod du; ;dbang ni chu yi ngogs su bya //
translated: The power is performed on the bank of a river,

original: rgyas pa zhing gi dbus su ste //
analyzed: rgyas pa zhing gi dbus su ste //
translated: The increase is in the middle of a field,

original: yang na dgon pa chen po ru //
analyzed: yang na dgon pa chen po ru //
translated: Or else in a great forest.

original: zhi ba de ni grong khyer du //
analyzed: zhi ba de ni grong khyer du //
translated: “The pacifying is in a town,

original: yang na rgyal po yi ni khab //
analyzed: yang na rgyal po yi ni khab //
translated: Or else in the palace of the king.🔽Horses, elephants,

original: rta dang glang po chen po dang // gzhon nu ma dang ba la sogs //🔽sbyin sreg dus su 'bad pa yis //
analyzed: rta dang glang po chen po dang // gzhon nu ma dang ba la sogs // sbyin sreg dus su 'bad pa yis //
translated: Young girls, cows, and so forth🔽“The mantrin should offer to the master

original: sngags pas slob dpon la dbul bya //
analyzed: sngags pas slob dpon la dbul bya //
translated: With effort at the time of the homa.

original: zha bo 'on pa dman pa la'ang //
analyzed: zha bo 'on pa dman pa la'ang //
translated: Even to the crippled, the deaf, and the lowly

original: ci nus kyis ni @20b sbyin par bya //
analyzed: ci nus kyis ni @20b sbyin par bya //
translated: One should give according to one’s ability.

original: dpal ye shes thig le las /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le las /
translated: From the glorious Wisdom-Essence Tantra,

analyzed: sbyin sreg gi chog zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
translated: Chapter 8, called “The Homa Rite.”

original: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas yang ni bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, next, I will explain

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtor ma che //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtor ma che //

original: khyim ni sum thog gi ni gnas //
analyzed: khyim ni sum thog gi ni gnas //
translated: The house is a three-story dwelling,

original: chom rkun kun dang bral ba yi //
analyzed: chom rkun kun dang bral ba yi //
translated: Free from all thieves,

original: phyi rol yul min nang gi min //
analyzed: phyi rol yul min nang gi min //

original: slob dpon 'dus las brgyan pa dang // rdo rje mda' ni rnam par gzugs //
analyzed: slob dpon 'dus las brgyan pa dang // rdo rje mda' ni rnam par gzugs //

analyzed: rdo rje skud la sogs pas bskor //

original: de lta bu yi khang mchog ni //
analyzed: de lta bu yi khang mchog ni //

original: sna tshogs me tog la sogs kyis //
analyzed: sna tshogs me tog la sogs kyis //

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par bya //

original: si hla ga bur gyis ni mdzes //
analyzed: si hla ga bur gyis ni mdzes //

original: de ru mchod sbyin don du ni //
analyzed: de ru mchod sbyin don du ni //

analyzed: byol song gzugs ni rab tu blang //

original: skye ba gcig gam gnyis pa'am //
analyzed: skye ba gcig gam gnyis pa'am //

original: yang na gsum pa lang tsho gsar //
analyzed: yang na gsum pa lang tsho gsar //

original: nang kun med pa bde grub pa //
analyzed: nang kun med pa bde grub pa //

original: dri zhim rdul ni 'byung ba can //
analyzed: dri zhim rdul ni 'byung ba can //

original: gang zhig mig ni yun ring 'dzum //
analyzed: gang zhig mig ni yun ring 'dzum //
translated: One whose eyes smile for a long time,

original: mkhas pas 'bad de blang bar bya //
analyzed: mkhas pas 'bad de blang bar bya //
translated: should be taken with effort by the wise.

original: sna tshogs pa yi mchod sbyin gyis //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa yi mchod sbyin gyis //

original: gri gug rung pas brtag par bya //
analyzed: gri gug rung pas brtag par bya //

original: yan lag rab kyis padma'i snod //
analyzed: yan lag rab kyis padma'i snod //

original: btung ba'i don du bla ma'i mdun //🔽phyed ni 'khor lo la brim ste //
analyzed: btung ba'i don du bla ma'i mdun // phyed ni 'khor lo la brim ste //
translated: in front of the guru for the purpose of drinking.🔽Half is distributed to the wheel,

original: phyed ni gtong mar gtang bar bya //
analyzed: phyed ni gtong mar gtang bar bya //

original: khrag chen dang ni sha chen po //
analyzed: khrag chen dang ni sha chen po //

original: ci rnyed pa ni brtag pa yin //
analyzed: ci rnyed pa ni brtag pa yin //

original: gzhan ni sna tshogs mchog bye brag /
analyzed: gzhan ni sna tshogs mchog bye brag /

original: nya dang sha la sogs par ldan //
analyzed: nya dang sha la sogs par ldan //

original: mi 'tshe pa dang skyon kun bral //
analyzed: mi 'tshe pa dang skyon kun bral //

original: sdig pa med dang ma bslangs @21a *//
analyzed: sdig pa med dang ma bslangs @21a *//

original: pa'o; ;chang ni chen po dang ldan pa //
analyzed: pa'o; ;chang ni chen po dang ldan pa //

original: glu dang rol mos rab tu mdzes //
analyzed: glu dang rol mos rab tu mdzes //

original: sgron ma lnga dang bsres pas ni //
analyzed: sgron ma lnga dang bsres pas ni //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang ldan //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang ldan //
translated: Endowed with the five tathagatas,

original: sna tshogs dbus su yan lag mchog /
analyzed: sna tshogs dbus su yan lag mchog /
translated: In the center of the variety, the supreme limb,

original: gang bas dkyil 'khor mdun du gzhag /
analyzed: gang bas dkyil 'khor mdun du gzhag /

original: ji ltar bla ma mchod dus su //
analyzed: ji ltar bla ma mchod dus su //

original: ji bzhin pa yi phyag rgya bcing //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa yi phyag rgya bcing //
translated: The mudra is held just as it is.

original: de bzhin du ni tshogs kyis kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni tshogs kyis kyang //
translated: In the same way, the assembly

original: rtse gcig gis ni bcing bar bya //
analyzed: rtse gcig gis ni bcing bar bya //

original: ldang ba 'am ni 'dug pa'i tshe //
analyzed: ldang ba 'am ni 'dug pa'i tshe //

original: tshogs kyi gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽shin tu dbyangs ni snyan pa yis //
analyzed: tshogs kyi gtso la phyag 'tshal lo // shin tu dbyangs ni snyan pa yis //
translated: Homage to the chief of the assembly.🔽With a very melodious voice,

original: yid 'phrog pa yi glu blang bya //
analyzed: yid 'phrog pa yi glu blang bya //
translated: One should sing a captivating song.

original: the tshom dang ni tshogs bcad min //
analyzed: the tshom dang ni tshogs bcad min //

original: ma gnang rdo rje gar mi bya //🔽rkang pa rkyong dang gnyid log pa //
analyzed: ma gnang rdo rje gar mi bya // rkang pa rkyong dang gnyid log pa //
translated: One should not perform the vajra dance without permission.🔽One should not stretch one’s legs or fall asleep

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lor mi bya 'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lor mi bya 'o //

original: dpal ldan rdo rje sems ji bzhin //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje sems ji bzhin //
translated: Just like the glorious Vajrasattva,

original: dpal ldan las kyi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan las kyi rdo rje'o //
translated: the glorious Karmavajra,

original: ci mdzad pa dang ci gsung ba //
analyzed: ci mdzad pa dang ci gsung ba //
translated: whatever he does and whatever he says,

original: de ni mkhas pas 'bad de sgrub //
analyzed: de ni mkhas pas 'bad de sgrub //
translated: the wise one should accomplish that with effort.

original: de ltar min na chad pa 'bab //
analyzed: de ltar min na chad pa 'bab //
translated: If one does not do it that way, one will be punished.

original: ji tsam nus pa yod pa yis //🔽de ru dam tshig dag pa ni //
analyzed: ji tsam nus pa yod pa yis // de ru dam tshig dag pa ni //
translated: To the best of one’s ability,🔽one should always protect the pure commitments

original: rtag tu bdag nyid bzhin bsrung bya //
analyzed: rtag tu bdag nyid bzhin bsrung bya //
translated: there, as if they were one’s own self.

original: dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub pa ni //
analyzed: dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub pa ni //
translated: If one protects the commitments,

original: lha yi dbang phyug rnyed pa 'o //
analyzed: lha yi dbang phyug rnyed pa 'o //
translated: one will attain the lordship of the gods.

original: dam tshig mchog gi ye shes te //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog gi ye shes te //
translated: The wisdom of the supreme commitment

original: dad pa yis ni rtag tu bza'//
analyzed: dad pa yis ni rtag tu bza'//
translated: should always be eaten with faith.

original: dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas su //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas su //
translated: Having completed the commitment of delight,

original: 'khor lo dang bcas rigs rab tshim //
analyzed: 'khor lo dang bcas rigs rab tshim //
translated: the wheel and the family are completely satisfied.

original: rab tshim byas nas gtor ma 'bul //
analyzed: rab tshim byas nas gtor ma 'bul //
translated: Having completely satisfied them, one should offer the bali

original: nam phyed lam gyi bzhi @21b mdor ro //
analyzed: nam phyed lam gyi bzhi @21b mdor ro //
translated: at midnight in the middle of the crossroads.

original: yang na sum mdo gyes pa ru //
analyzed: yang na sum mdo gyes pa ru //
translated: Or else, in the fork of a trijunction,

original: dur khrod dam ni chu ngogs su //
analyzed: dur khrod dam ni chu ngogs su //
translated: In a charnel ground or on the bank of a river,

original: lhag ma 'am ni yang na phud //
analyzed: lhag ma 'am ni yang na phud //
translated: the remainder or the leftovers,

original: de kun bsres te chu yis sbyang //
analyzed: de kun bsres te chu yis sbyang //
translated: all of that is mixed and purified with water.

original: gzhan rnams kun ni so sor gzhag /
analyzed: gzhan rnams kun ni so sor gzhag /
translated: All the others are left as they are.

original: rtsa ba ji bzhin rim pas gzhag /
analyzed: rtsa ba ji bzhin rim pas gzhag /
translated: They are placed in order, just as they are.

original: rang gnas phyin pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: rang gnas phyin pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely arriving at their own place,

original: 'khor lo la ni snod gcig brtag /
analyzed: 'khor lo la ni snod gcig brtag /
translated: one should examine the vessel for the wheel.

original: slob dpon la ni dum bu gcig /
analyzed: slob dpon la ni dum bu gcig /
translated: For the master, there is one piece.

original: 'bad pa yis ni bsrung bar bya //
analyzed: 'bad pa yis ni bsrung bar bya //
translated: One should protect it with effort.

original: rang gi tshogs la sbyin mi bya //
analyzed: rang gi tshogs la sbyin mi bya //
translated: One should not give it to one's own assembly.

original: rang dbang bskur ba'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rang dbang bskur ba'ang de bzhin no //
translated: The conferral of independence is also like that.

original: gzhon gyi yan lag phyag rgyas gar //
analyzed: gzhon gyi yan lag phyag rgyas gar //
translated: The dance with the mudra of the youth

original: g-yon gyi lag pas mchod pa 'o //
analyzed: g-yon gyi lag pas mchod pa 'o //
translated: is the offering with the left hand.

original: g-yon gyi rkang pas bsnun byas nas //
analyzed: g-yon gyi rkang pas bsnun byas nas //
translated: Having struck with the left foot,

original: g-yon mig gis ni blta bya 'o //
analyzed: g-yon mig gis ni blta bya 'o //
translated: one should look with the left eye.

original: gal te re zhig de'i dus su rnal 'byor mas brtag pa'i don gyi phyir 'ongs na 'jigs par mi bya ste /
analyzed: gal te re zhig de'i dus su rnal 'byor mas brtag pa'i don gyi phyir 'ongs na 'jigs par mi bya ste /
translated: If the yoginī comes for the sake of examining at that time, one should not be afraid.

original: seng+ge lta bu'i tshul gyis yongs su brtag go /
analyzed: seng+ge lta bu'i tshul gyis yongs su brtag go /
translated: One should examine her with the method of the lion.

original: de ltar yang rnal 'byor ma kun gzugs sna tshogs pa dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs pa dang / skad sna tshogs pa rab tu byed do //
analyzed: de ltar yang rnal 'byor ma kun gzugs sna tshogs pa dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs pa dang / skad sna tshogs pa rab tu byed do //
translated: Thus, the yoginīs assume various forms, various gestures, and various languages.

original: gang gi tshe dang por rgyang ring po nas ha ha ra dgod pa de'i tshe khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya sbyin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dang por rgyang ring po nas ha ha ra dgod pa de'i tshe khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya sbyin no //
translated: When, at first, she laughs ha ha from afar, then one should give the gesture of Trailokyavijaya.

original: de'i dus su ha'i yig 'bru lnga sgra chen pos brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dus su ha'i yig 'bru lnga sgra chen pos brjod par bya'o //
translated: At that time, one should utter the five syllables of ha with a loud sound.

original: cung zad nye bar 'ongs na aa la la zhes smra bar bya'o; ;gang gi tshe phrad tsam na lag pa bskor na de'i tshe gyen du lag pa'i dbyug pa sgreng ba'i mdzub mo sbyin no //
analyzed: cung zad nye bar 'ongs na aa la la zhes smra bar bya'o; ;gang gi tshe phrad tsam na lag pa bskor na de'i tshe gyen du lag pa'i dbyug pa sgreng ba'i mdzub mo sbyin no //
translated: When she comes a little closer, one should say “ala la.” When she comes to meet, if she circles her arms, then one should give the index finger raised like a stick.

original: gang gi tshe smin ma 'byed na de'i tshe 'jigs par lce bsgril bar @22a *//
analyzed: gang gi tshe smin ma 'byed na de'i tshe 'jigs par lce bsgril bar @22a *//
translated: When she opens her eyebrows, then one should roll one’s tongue in fear.

original: bya'o; ;gang gi tshe stang du lta ba de'i tshe g-yon brkyang bas sa mnan par bya'o //
analyzed: bya'o; ;gang gi tshe stang du lta ba de'i tshe g-yon brkyang bas sa mnan par bya'o //
translated: When she looks down, then one should press the ground with the extended left leg.

original: gang gi tshe rgyab nas lta ba de'i tshe g-yas brkyang bas mnan par bya'o; ;gang gi tshe rnam par dgod pa de'i tshe phem ka ra zhes brjod par bya'o //🔽gang gi tshe du ba de'i tshe bgad par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rgyab nas lta ba de'i tshe g-yas brkyang bas mnan par bya'o; ;gang gi tshe rnam par dgod pa de'i tshe phem ka ra zhes brjod par bya'o // gang gi tshe du ba de'i tshe bgad par bya'o //
translated: When laughing, one should laugh.

original: gang gi tshe gar byed pa de'i tshe stod khengs bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gar byed pa de'i tshe stod khengs bya'o //
translated: When dancing, one should dance.

original: gang gi tshe skra bkrol ba de'i tshe gtsug phud dgrol lo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe skra bkrol ba de'i tshe gtsug phud dgrol lo //
translated: When the hair is let down, one should let down the topknot.

original: gang gi tshe gos bor bar byed pa de'i tshe langs te gci ba gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gos bor bar byed pa de'i tshe langs te gci ba gtang bar bya'o //
translated: When the clothes are removed, one should stand up and urinate.

original: gang gi tshe gci ba 'thung ba de'i tshe rkang pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong gis rtsa btog par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gci ba 'thung ba de'i tshe rkang pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong gis rtsa btog par bya'o //
translated: When drinking urine, one should drink the urine with the big toe of the left foot.

original: gang gi tshe gtam 'dri ba de'i tshe smra bar mi bya'o //🔽gang gi tshe 'phrug pa de'i tshe ral pa mdud par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gtam 'dri ba de'i tshe smra bar mi bya'o // gang gi tshe 'phrug pa de'i tshe ral pa mdud par bya'o //
translated: When asked about news, one should not speak.🔽When scratching, one should tie the hair in a topknot.

original: gang gi tshe dpral bar reg pa de'i tshe steng gi mtshams kyi mthar reg go /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dpral bar reg pa de'i tshe steng gi mtshams kyi mthar reg go /
translated: When touching the forehead, one should touch the end of the upper boundary.

original: gang gi tshe rna bar reg pa de'i tshe mgrin pa la reg par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rna bar reg pa de'i tshe mgrin pa la reg par bya'o //
translated: When she touches her ear, touch her throat.

original: gang gi tshe sna la reg pa de'i tshe lce phyir dbyung ngo //🔽gang gi tshe mgrin pa ston pa de'i tshe lag pa brkyang bar bya'o //🔽gang gi tshe nu ma ston pa de'i tshe mig srub bskyod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sna la reg pa de'i tshe lce phyir dbyung ngo // gang gi tshe mgrin pa ston pa de'i tshe lag pa brkyang bar bya'o // gang gi tshe nu ma ston pa de'i tshe mig srub bskyod par bya'o //
translated: When she touches her nose, stick out your tongue.🔽When she shows her neck, extend your hand.🔽When she shows her breast, blink your eyes.

original: gang gi tshe lte ba ston pa de'i tshe se gol sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe lte ba ston pa de'i tshe se gol sbyin par bya'o //
translated: When she shows her navel, snap your fingers.

original: gang gi tshe rked pa sgul ba de'i tshe mtshan bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rked pa sgul ba de'i tshe mtshan bstan par bya'o //
translated: When she sways her hips, show her your genitals.🔽When she stretches out her legs, extend both your little fingers and your index fingers.

original: gang gi tshe rkang pa rkyong ba de'i tshe mthe'u chung gnyis ga gdang bar bya ba dang / mdzub mos mig kyang de bzhin @22b no; ;sna'i phur ma bar ma'i lce phyir dbyung bar bya zhing g-yas brkyang dang g-yon brkyang sbyin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rkang pa rkyong ba de'i tshe mthe'u chung gnyis ga gdang bar bya ba dang / mdzub mos mig kyang de bzhin @22b no; ;sna'i phur ma bar ma'i lce phyir dbyung bar bya zhing g-yas brkyang dang g-yon brkyang sbyin no //
translated: When she extends her nose, stick out your tongue and give her the right and left.

original: gang gi tshe sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bstan pa de'i tshe 'khor lo bcu'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bstan pa de'i tshe 'khor lo bcu'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
translated: When he teaches various forms, at that time one should recite the mantra of the ten wheels.

original: gang gi tshe yi ge'i don brjod pa de'i tshe yi ges lan brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe yi ge'i don brjod pa de'i tshe yi ges lan brjod par bya'o //
translated: When he teaches the meaning of the letters, at that time one should recite the reply of the letters.

original: gang gi tshe phyir brjod pa de'i tshe sha'i lan smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe phyir brjod pa de'i tshe sha'i lan smra bar bya'o //
translated: When he teaches the reply, at that time one should speak the reply of the flesh.

original: gang gi tshe rgyal mtshan zhes smra ba de'i tshe mtshan zhes slar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rgyal mtshan zhes smra ba de'i tshe mtshan zhes slar brjod par bya'o //
translated: When he speaks of the banner, at that time one should reply with the sign.

original: gang gi padma brjod pa de'i tshe mngal zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi padma brjod pa de'i tshe mngal zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: When he speaks of the lotus, at that time one should speak of the womb.

original: gang gi tshe gshol zhes smra ba de'i tshe lag pa zhes brjod par bya'o; ;gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i len pa de'i tshe sha li zhes smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gshol zhes smra ba de'i tshe lag pa zhes brjod par bya'o; ;gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i len pa de'i tshe sha li zhes smra bar bya'o //
translated: When he speaks of the plow, at that time one should speak of the hand. When he speaks of the grasping of desire, at that time one should speak of rice.

original: gang gi tshe tshon rtsi brjod pa de'i tshe zan zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe tshon rtsi brjod pa de'i tshe zan zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: When he speaks of the colors, at that time one should speak of food.

original: gang gi tshe srog ces brjod pa de'i tshe ch zla zhes smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe srog ces brjod pa de'i tshe ch zla zhes smra bar bya'o //
translated: When he speaks of life, at that time one should speak of the moon.

original: gang gi tshe rnyed pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe yid ces bstan to //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnyed pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe yid ces bstan to //
translated: When he says “gain,” he is referring to the mind.

original: gang gi tshe mi dga' ba brjod pa de'i tshe lam bstan to //
analyzed: gang gi tshe mi dga' ba brjod pa de'i tshe lam bstan to //
translated: When he says “displeasure,” he is referring to the path.

original: gang gi tshe khro ba zhes brjod pa de'i tshe chang btung zhing slar brjod do //🔽gang gi tshe mdo pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe ngal bso zhes smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe khro ba zhes brjod pa de'i tshe chang btung zhing slar brjod do // gang gi tshe mdo pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe ngal bso zhes smra'o //
translated: When he says “anger,” he is referring to drinking alcohol and speaking again.🔽When he says “scripture,” he is referring to resting.

original: gang gi tshe bstan pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe gnyid ces smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bstan pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe gnyid ces smra'o //
translated: When he says “teaching,” he is referring to sleep.

original: gang gi tshe dus brjod pa de'i tshe dga' ba zhes smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dus brjod pa de'i tshe dga' ba zhes smra'o //
translated: When he says “time,” he is referring to pleasure.

original: gang gi tshe zla ba zhes brjod pa de'i tshe gos zhes smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zla ba zhes brjod pa de'i tshe gos zhes smra'o //
translated: When he says “moon,” he is referring to clothing.

original: gang gi tshe nyi ma dran no zhes brjod pa de'i tshe skom zhes smra'o //🔽gang gi tshe @23a *//
analyzed: gang gi tshe nyi ma dran no zhes brjod pa de'i tshe skom zhes smra'o // gang gi tshe @23a *//

original: me zhes brjod pa de'i tshe grib ma zhes smra'o //
analyzed: me zhes brjod pa de'i tshe grib ma zhes smra'o //
translated: When he says “fire,” he is referring to shade.

analyzed: gang gi tshe nya zhes brjod pa de'i tshe 'ong zhes smra'o //

analyzed: gang gi tshe glu'i sgra brjod pa de'i tshe gser zhes smra'o //
translated: When the word “song” is spoken, it means “gold.”

original: gang gi tshe sa le sbram zhes smra ba de'i tshe khyer ces smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sa le sbram zhes smra ba de'i tshe khyer ces smra'o //

original: gang gi tshe ro zhes brjod pa de'i tshe sa zhes smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ro zhes brjod pa de'i tshe sa zhes smra'o //
translated: When the word “taste” is spoken, it means “earth.”

original: gang gi tshe nga rgyal ces brjod pa de'i tshe rlung zhes smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nga rgyal ces brjod pa de'i tshe rlung zhes smra'o //

analyzed: gang gi tshe mtsho zhes smra ba de'i tshe legs zhes brjod do //
translated: When the word “lake” is spoken, it means “good.”

original: gang gi tshe mda' zhes brjod pa de'i tshe khrims 'chal zhes smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe mda' zhes brjod pa de'i tshe khrims 'chal zhes smra'o //
translated: When the word “arrow” is spoken, it means “immoral.”

original: gang gi tshe chags pa'i sgra byed pa de'i tshe 'ong zhes smra'o; ;gang gi tshe'o mas zhes brjod pa de'i tshe song zhes smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe chags pa'i sgra byed pa de'i tshe 'ong zhes smra'o; ;gang gi tshe'o mas zhes brjod pa de'i tshe song zhes smra'o //

original: gang gi tshe ser sna zhes brjod pa de'i tshe grub ces smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ser sna zhes brjod pa de'i tshe grub ces smra'o //
translated: When the word “stinginess” is spoken, it means “accomplish.”

original: gang gi tshe nya la zhes brjod pa de'i tshe med ces brjod do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nya la zhes brjod pa de'i tshe med ces brjod do //
translated: When the word “fish” is spoken, it means “nonexistent.”

analyzed: gang gi tshe 'bru zhes brjod pa de'i tshe yang dag ces smra'o //

analyzed: gang gi tshe rgyas pa zhes brjod pa de'i tshe dri chu ces brjod do //

analyzed: gang gi tshe ri bong zhes brjod pa de'i tshe dri chen zhes brjod do //

analyzed: gang gi tshe bshol zhes brjod pa de'i tshe khrag ces smra'o //

analyzed: gang gi tshe grangs zhes smra ba de'i tshe khu ba zhes brjod do //

analyzed: gang gi tshe zla ba zhes brjod pa de'i tshe dga' ba phrad ces smra'o //

analyzed: gang gi tshe ba la sha zhes brjod pa de'i tshe ngal zhes smra'o //

analyzed: gang gi tshe sindhu brjod pa de'i tshe mi khom zhes smra'o //

original: gzhan ni // rang rang gi yi ge'i @23b rtsa ba'i don shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni // rang rang gi yi ge'i @23b rtsa ba'i don shes par bya'o //

original: bud med gang zhig rkang lag chen po de ni g-yon du gtang ngo //
analyzed: bud med gang zhig rkang lag chen po de ni g-yon du gtang ngo //

analyzed: spu mang ba de dag gi mdun du se gol gsum sbyin par bya'o // bud med gang zhig kha dog nag cing gsus khyim smad du 'phyang la nu ma 'jol zhing so che ba de dag gi mdun du gci ba gtang ngo //

analyzed: bud med gang zhig skra ser zhing mig zlum la sen mo ring ba //

analyzed: mgrin pa ring ba de dag gi mdun du gad rgyangs chen po bya'o //

original: bud med gang zhig tsam pa'i me tog ltar dkar zhing skad 'jam la mig ring ba so ri lta bu dri zhim po la dga' zhing bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa /
analyzed: bud med gang zhig tsam pa'i me tog ltar dkar zhing skad 'jam la mig ring ba so ri lta bu dri zhim po la dga' zhing bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa /

analyzed: zur mig lta ba /

original: mnyam par ma gzhag par de lta bu byed pa de'i mdun du cang mi smra bar sa la lta zhing myur ba myur bar g-yon ngos su 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: mnyam par ma gzhag par de lta bu byed pa de'i mdun du cang mi smra bar sa la lta zhing myur ba myur bar g-yon ngos su 'gro bar bya'o //

analyzed: de lta bu'i dus su snying po'i sngags zlos shing phreng ba bgrang bar bya'o //
translated: At that time, one should recite the essence mantra and count the rosary.

original: bud med gang zhig sor mo gcig ni /
analyzed: bud med gang zhig sor mo gcig ni /

analyzed: gos dpung pa'i ngos su 'phyang ba smin ma'i dbus na dngos su phyag rgya padma'i dbyibs sam 'khri shing ngam /
translated: with her garment hanging over her shoulder, with a lotus shape or a creeper or

analyzed: yang na aa sho ka gnyen po'i rtse mo dang 'dra ba mjug ma de dang lhan cig 'bad pas 'dus pa bya'o //
translated: the top of an aśoka branch actually in the middle of her eyebrows, one should make an effort to unite with her.

original: de ni / @24a *//
analyzed: de ni / @24a *//
translated: She

analyzed: thams cad 'grub par byed pa dang / 'bras bu thams cad byed pa /
translated: accomplishes everything and does everything that is fruitful.

original: dga' ba chen po skyed par byed pas /

analyzed: de dang lhan cig gtor ma chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du rgya chen po'i sems kyis rtog pa med par sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Together with that, one should give the great sacrificial cake with a vast mind for the benefit of all sentient beings, without conceptualization.

analyzed: shin tu rgya che'i snod dag tu //
translated: In very vast vessels,

analyzed: dbus su dpal ldan 'jigs pa'i gzugs //

analyzed: sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang bcas //

original: khrag chen pos ni yang dag bkang //
analyzed: khrag chen pos ni yang dag bkang //
translated: filled with great blood,

analyzed: ka b'a la ni phyag g-yas su'o //
translated: and a skull-cup in the right hand.🔽The great god, endowed with various forms,

analyzed: lha chen sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan; ;langs pa phyag ni g-yon pas so //

analyzed: nag po me yi drag po shar //

original: nag po chen po lho phyogs su //
analyzed: nag po chen po lho phyogs su //
translated: great black one, in the southern direction.🔽In the western direction, Bhairava,

original: nub kyi phyogs su 'jigs byed dang // drag po chen po byang gi phyogs //🔽me yi mtshams drag ral pa can //
analyzed: nub kyi phyogs su 'jigs byed dang // drag po chen po byang gi phyogs // me yi mtshams drag ral pa can //
translated: and great fierce one, in the northern direction.🔽In the southeast, fierce Kapālin,

original: chu bdag mtshams su dbyug nag po //
analyzed: chu bdag mtshams su dbyug nag po //
translated: in the southwest, Kālarūpa,

analyzed: ral pa gsum ma dang / ral drag ma dang / drag mig ma dang / sdug ma dang / g-yas bskor g-yon bskor sdud pa yis //

analyzed: snod rlon par rim pas bzhag go /

analyzed: de'i phyi rol tu @24b 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad chogs mang po dang bcas pas bskor ba'o //

analyzed: klu chen po brgyad pho nya dang pho nya mo dang / tse ta  dang na  tse ti 'khor dang bcas pa'o //

original: dam tshig bskyang bar mdzod cig /
analyzed: dam tshig bskyang bar mdzod cig /

analyzed: 'thung zhig / bdag gi las thams cad grub par mdzod cig /

original: dam tshig zungs shig /
analyzed: dam tshig zungs shig /

original: h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
translated: HUM HUM Phat Phat SVAH

original: dpal ye shes thig le las /
analyzed: dpal ye shes thig le las /
translated: From the glorious Wisdom-Essence,

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang / gtor ma chen po dang / rnal 'byor mtshan nyid dang / gsang ba'i tshig dang / phyag rgya'i brda zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////

translated: the chapter called the Ritual of the Ganachakra, the Great Torma, the Characteristics of the Yoginis, the Secret Words, and the Symbolic Language of the Mudras, is the ninth.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
